anya-e0105n:148_3: bhāsitaṃ ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti. Taṃ kissa hetu, evañhi no sutte ocaratīti…pe…
anya-e0105n:148_4: mano kho māgaṇḍiya dhammārāmo dhammarato dhammasammudito, so tathāgatassa danto gutto
anya-e0105n:148_5: rakkhito saṃvuto, tassa ca saṃvarāya dhammaṃ deseti, idaṃ nu te etaṃ māgaṇḍiya sandhāya
anya-e0105n:148_6: bhāsitaṃ ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti. Etadeva kho pana me bho gotama sandhāya bhāsitaṃ
anya-e0105n:148_7: ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti. Taṃ kissa hetu, evañhi no sutte ocaratī”ti ma. ni. 2.207 ādayo.
anya-e0105n:149: Evaṃ bhagavato ca anuyogo māgaṇḍiyassa ca paṭiññā āgatā.
anya-e0105n:150_0: Ettha hi methunappaṭisevanavasena phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaparibhogahetu eva gabbhapatiṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0105n:150_1: sambhavatīti tadaparibhogameva sandhāya “bhūnahū”ti vattuṃ arahati, tadaññesaṃ pana
anya-e0105n:150_2: pañcannaṃ rūpādiārammaṇānaṃ, tatthāpi visesato dhammārammaṇassa suddhamanoviññāṇena
anya-e0105n:150_3: paribhogahetu natthi kiñci gabbhapatiṭṭhānanti tesaṃ aparibhogaṃ sandhāya bhūnahūti
anya-e0105n:150_4: vattuṃ na arahatiyeva, māgaṇḍiyena pana sabbānipi tāni sandhāya vuttabhāvo paṭiññāto,
anya-e0105n:150_5: kāraṇañcassa dassitaṃ “evañhi no sutte ocaratī”ti. Tasmā kiñcāpi dāni brāhmaṇaganthesu
anya-e0105n:150_6: bhūnahu- (bhrūnahā) saddo gabbhaghātanatthe dissati, māgaṇḍiyasutte paneso attho
anya-e0105n:150_7: na yujjatīti ācariyena “hatavaḍḍhi mariyādakārako”ti ayamevattho porāṇaṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0105n:151_1: so hi visuddhimagge sīlaniddese (1, 31) brāhmaṇānaṃ parihāsaṃ karonto ‘evaṃ iminā
anya-e0105n:151_2: piṇḍapātapaṭisevanena purāṇañca jighacchāvedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi, navañca vedanaṃ aparimitabhojanapaccayaṃ
anya-e0105n:151_3: āharahatthaka alaṃsāṭaka tatravaṭṭaka kākamāsaka bhuttavamitakabrāhmaṇānaṃ aññataro
anya-e0105n:151_4: viya na uppādessāmīti paṭisevatī’ti āha. Idaṃ pana ekassa bhinnabrāhmaṇaladdhikassāpi
anya-e0105n:151_5: vacanaṃ siyāti tadeva daḷhakāraṇaṃ katvā na sakkā ‘buddhaghoso abrāhmaṇo’ti vattu”nti
anya-e0105n:151_6: tatiyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana atisaṃvejanīyavacanameva. Na hetaṃ ācariyena brāhmaṇānaṃ
anya-e0105n:151_7: parihāsaṃ kātukāmena vuttaṃ, na ca taṃ parihāsavacanena saṃyojetabbaṭṭhānaṃ, aññadatthu
anya-e0105n:151_9: tathāyeva ca ācariyena vuttaṃ. Tathā hi ye loke paradattūpajīvino samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā
anya-e0105n:151_10: vā aññe vāpi ca puggalā, te paccavekkhaṇañāṇarahitā asaṃvare ṭhitā kadāci atipaṇītaṃ
anya-e0105n:151_11: rasaṃ pahūtaṃ laddhā aparimitampi bhuñjeyyuṃ, visesato pana brāhmaṇā lokikavatthuvasena
anya-e0105n:151_12: ca, jātakādisāsanikavatthuvasena ca tādisā ahesunti pākaṭā. Imasmiñhi loke vassasatasahassehi
anya-e0105n:151_13: vā vassakoṭīhi vā aparicchinnaddhāne ko sakkā vattuṃ “nedisā bhūtapubbā”ti. Tasmā
anya-e0105n:151_14: tādisehi viya na aparimitabhojanehi bhavitabbanti ovādānusāsanidānavaseneva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0105n:151_15: Tadevaṃ atthasaṃhitampi samānaṃ ayonisomanasikaroto anatthameva jātaṃ, yathā sabhariyassa
anya-e0105n:151_16: māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇassa anāgāmimaggaphalatthāyapi desitā gāthā dha. pa. aṭṭha. 1.sāmāvatīvatthu
anya-e0105n:151_17: tesaṃ dhītuyā anatthāya saṃvattatīti saṃvegoyevettha brūhetabboti.
anya-e0105n:153: 3. Atha tena “pātañjalīmataṃ parivattetī”ti vacanampi evaṃ vicāritaṃ.
anya-e0105n:154_0: (Ka) “buddhaghoso patañjalissa vā aññesaṃ vā uttaraindiyaraṭṭhikānaṃ vādaṃ appakameva
anya-e0105n:154_1: aññāsi. Patañjalivādesu hi aṇimā laghimāti idameva dvayaṃ dassesi visuddhi. 1.144
anya-e0105n:154_2: tatuttari yogasuttaṃ ajānanto, patañjalivādassa ca tuletvā dīpanā tassa ganthesu
anya-e0105n:154_3: na dissati, patañjalinā katapakaraṇañca patañjalīti nāmamattampi ca tattha dīpitaṃ
anya-e0105n:154_4: natthi. Visuddhimagge pana paññābhūminiddese ‘pakativādīnaṃ pakati viyā’ti visuddhi.
anya-e0105n:154_5: 2.584 pakativāda (saṃkhyāvāda) nāmamattaṃ pakāsitaṃ, tattheva ca ‘paṭiññā hetūtiādīsu
anya-e0105n:154_6: hi loke vacanāvayavo hetūti vuccatī’ti visuddhi. 2.595 udāharitaṃ, tena ñāyati ‘buddhaghoso
anya-e0105n:154_7: indiyatakkanayadīpake ñāyaganthasmiṃ kiñci mūlabhāgamattaṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ jānātī’ti”.
anya-e0105n:155_0: Taṃ pana sabbampi kevalaṃ ācariyassa abbhācikkhaṇamattameva. Atigambhīrassa hi atigarukātabbassa
anya-e0105n:155_1: suparisuddhassa piṭakattayassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ karontena suparisuddhoyeva pāḷinayo
anya-e0105n:155_2: ca aṭṭhakathānayo ca porāṇatheravādā cāti īdisāyeva atthā pakāsetabbā, yaṃ vā pana
anya-e0105n:155_4: ca yathārahaṃ pakāsetabbaṃ, na pana anupakārānipi taṃtaṃganthatakkattunāmāni ca,
anya-e0105n:155_5: tehi vuttavacanāni ca bahūni, na ca tesaṃ appakāsanena “na te aṭṭhakathācariyo jānātī”ti
anya-e0105n:155_6: vattabbo. Yadi hi yaṃ yaṃ lokiyaganthaṃ attanā jānāti, taṃ sabbaṃ anupakārampi attano
anya-e0105n:155_7: aṭṭhakathāyamānetvā pakāseyya, ativitthārā ca sā bhaveyya aparisuddhā ca asammānitā
anya-e0105n:155_8: ca sāsanikaviññūhīti ācariyena patañjalivādādayo na vitthārena pakāsitāti ñātabbaṃ,
anya-e0105n:155_9: aññadatthu yehi yehi lokiyaganthehi kiñci kiñci ācariyena ānetvā pakāsitaṃ, te te
anya-e0105n:155_10: ca ganthā, aññepi ca tādisā ācariyena ñātātveva jānitabbā viññūhi, yathā samuddassa
anya-e0105n:155_11: ekadesaṃ disvā sabbopi samuddo edisoti ñāyati. Ācariyo pana yattha yattha vedapaṭisaṃyuttavacanāni
anya-e0105n:155_12: āgatāni, tattha tattha vedaganthehipi kiñci kiñci ānetvā pakāsesiyeva. Tathā hi ācariyena
anya-e0105n:156: “Tiṇṇaṃ vedānanti iruvedayajuvedasāmavedāna”nti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.256 ca,
anya-e0105n:157_0: “Itihāsapañcamānanti athabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā itiha āsa itiha āsāti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto
anya-e0105n:157_1: purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā, tesaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ
anya-e0105n:158: “Yiṭṭhaṃ vuccati mahāyāgo”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.170-172 ca,
anya-e0105n:159_0: “Aggihomanti evarūpena dārunā evaṃ hute idaṃ nāma hotīti aggijuhanaṃ. Dabbihomādīnipi
anya-e0105n:159_1: aggihomāneva, evarūpāya dabbiyā īdisehi kaṇādīhi hute idaṃ nāma hotīti evaṃ pavattivasena
anya-e0105n:159_2: pana visuṃ vuttānī”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.21 ca,
anya-e0105n:160: “Sāsapādīni pana mukhena gahetvā aggimhi pakkhipanaṃ, vijjaṃ parijappitvā juhanaṃ vā mukhahoma”nti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.21 ca –
anya-e0105n:161_0: Evamādinā vedapaṭisaṃyuttavacanāni vedaganthānurūpato vaṇṇitāni. Tāni ca porāṇaṭṭhakathāto
anya-e0105n:161_1: bhāsāparivattanavasena vuttānipi bhaveyyuṃ, vedaganthesu pana akovidena yāthāvato
anya-e0105n:161_2: bhāsāparivattanaṃ kātumpi na sukarameva, tasmā ācariyassa vedaganthesu kovidabhāvopi
anya-e0105n:161_3: pākaṭoyeva. Evaṃ vedaganthesu ca tadaññalokiyaganthesu ca sukovidasseva samānassa
anya-e0105n:166: Yasmā ayaṃ hessati vaṇṇanāpī”ti pārā. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:171: Hitvā punappunāgata-matthaṃ atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā ca–
anya-e0105n:172_1: karissāmīti paṭiññaṃ katvā yathāpaṭiññātameva akāsi, na attano ñāṇappabhāvena visesetvātipi
anya-e0105n:172_2: veditabbaṃ. Tasmā aṭṭhakathāsu patañjalivādādīnaṃ vitthārato appakāsanamārabbha “buddhaghoso
anya-e0105n:172_3: patañjalivādādīni paripuṇṇaṃ na jānātī”ti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ ācariyassa abbhācikkhaṇamattamevāti.
anya-e0105n:174_0: 4. Punapi so evamāha “kiñcāpi buddhaghoso rāmāyaṇamahābhāratasaṅkhātānaṃ mahākabbasatthānaṃ
anya-e0105n:174_1: sukusalo viya na dissati, tathāpi tāni dassesi. Kathaṃ? Akkhānanti bhāratayujjhanādikaṃ,
anya-e0105n:174_2: taṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne kathīyati, tattha gantumpi na vaṭṭatīti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.13 ca,
anya-e0105n:174_4: tathārūpikathākathanañcāti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.8 ca dassesī”ti.
anya-e0105n:175_0: Taṃ pana purimavacanatopi ahetukataraṃ kevalaṃ anādarīkaraṇamattameva. Atigambhīratthassa
anya-e0105n:175_1: hi atigarukaraṇīyassa piṭakattayassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ niratthakassa samphapalāpasamudāyabhūtassa
anya-e0105n:175_2: kabbasatthassa vitthārato pakāsanena kiṃ siyā payojanaṃ, aññadatthu sāyevassa asammānitā,
anya-e0105n:177_0: 5. Punapi dhammānando ācariyassa bāhusaccaguṇaṃ makkhetukāmo evamāha – “tassa (buddhaghosassa)
anya-e0105n:177_1: samayantarakovidasaṅkhātaṃ bāhusaccaṃ na tato uttaritaraṃ hoti, yaṃ ādhunikānaṃ ganthantarakovidānaṃ
anya-e0105n:177_2: sīhaḷikabhikkhūnaṃ yaṃ vā ekādasame kharistavassasatake (1001-1100) uppannānaṃ dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhikānaṃ
anya-e0105n:178_0: Taṃ pana sabbathāpi ayuttavacanameva. Yadi hi ādhunikā vā sīhaḷikabhikkhū, porāṇā
anya-e0105n:178_2: samānā vā uttaritarā vā bhaveyyuṃ, te ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa aṭṭhakathāhi anāraddhacittā
anya-e0105n:178_3: hutvā tato sundaratarā paripuṇṇatarā ca abhinavaṭṭhakathāyo kareyyuṃ, na pana te
anya-e0105n:178_4: tathā karonti, na kevalaṃ na karontiyeva, atha kho tesaṃ ekopi na evaṃ vadati “ahaṃ
anya-e0105n:178_5: buddhaghosena bāhusaccavasena samasamoti vā uttaritaro”ti vā, aññadatthu te ācariyassa
anya-e0105n:178_6: aṭṭhakathāyoyeva saṃvaṇṇenti ca upatthambhenti ca, ācariyaṭṭhāne ca ṭhapenti. Tenetaṃ
anya-e0105n:180_0: 6. Puna so tāvattakenāpi asantuṭṭho ācariyaṃ avamaññanto evamāha – “mahāyānanikāyassa
anya-e0105n:180_1: padhānācariyabhūtānaṃ assa ghosa-nāgajjunānaṃ nayaṃ vā, nāmamattampi vā tesaṃ na
anya-e0105n:180_2: jānāti maññe buddhaghoso”ti. Taṃ pana ativiya adhammikaṃ niratthakañca niggahavacanamattameva.
anya-e0105n:180_3: Na hi nikāyantarikānaṃ vādanayānaṃ attano aṭṭhakathāyaṃ appakāsanena so te na jānātīti
anya-e0105n:180_4: sakkā vattuṃ. Nanu ācariyena āgamaṭṭhakathāsu ganthārambheyeva –
anya-e0105n:186_0: “Tassā atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ karontena vibhajjavādimaṇḍalaṃ otaritvā ācariye anabbhācikkhantena
anya-e0105n:186_1: sakasamayaṃ avokkamantena parasamayaṃ anāyūhantena suttaṃ appaṭibāhantena vinayaṃ
anya-e0105n:186_2: anulomentena mahāpadese olokentena dhammaṃ dīpentena atthaṃ saṅgāhentena tamevatthaṃ
anya-e0105n:186_3: punarāvattetvā aparehipi pariyāyantarehi niddisantena ca yasmā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā kātabbā
anya-e0105n:191_0: Paṭiññaṃ katvā yathāpaṭiññātappakāreneva aṭṭhakathāyo katā. Evametāsaṃ karaṇe kāraṇampettha
anya-e0105n:191_1: pakāsetabbaṃ, tasmā dāni tampakāsanatthaṃ sammāsambuddhassa parinibbutikālato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0105n:191_2: yāva ācariyabuddhaghosassa kālo, tāva sāsanappavattikkamampi vakkhāma.
anya-e0105n:193_0: Bhagavato hi parinibbutikālato pacchā vassasatabbhantare buddhasāsane kocipi vādabhedo
anya-e0105n:193_1: nāma natthi. Vassasatakāle pana dutiyasaṅgītikārehi therehi nikkaḍḍhitā vajjiputtakā
anya-e0105n:193_2: bhikkhū pakkhaṃ labhitvā dhammañca vinayañca aññathā katvā mahāsaṅgītināmena visuṃ
anya-e0105n:193_4: gaṇo theravādoti ca tadaññesaṃ mahāsaṅghikoti ca voharīyanti.
anya-e0105n:194_0: Puna mahāsaṅghikato (1) gokuliko (2) ekabyohārikoti dve ācariyagaṇā uppannā. Puna
anya-e0105n:194_1: gokulikato (3) paññattivādo (4) bāhuliko (bahussutiko)ti dve uppannā. Puna bāhulikatopi
anya-e0105n:194_2: (5) cetiyavādigaṇo uppannoti ete pañca mūlabhūtena mahāsaṅghikena saha cha pāṭiyekkā ācariyagaṇā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0105n:195_0: Visuddhattheravādatopi (1) mahisāsako (2) vajjiputtakoti dve ācariyagaṇā uppannā.
anya-e0105n:195_1: Puna mahisāsakato (3) sabbatthivādo (4) dhammaguttikoti dve uppannā. Puna sabbatthivādatopi
anya-e0105n:195_2: (5) kassapiyo, tatopi (6) saṅkantiko, tatopi (7) suttavādīti tayo uppannā. Vajjiputtakatopi
anya-e0105n:195_3: (8) dhammottariyo (9) bhaddayāniko (10) channāgāriko (11) sammitiyoti cattāro uppannāti
anya-e0105n:195_4: te ekādasa mūlabhūtena visuddhattheravādena saha dvādasa ācariyagaṇā ahesuṃ. Iti
anya-e0105n:195_5: ime ca dvādasa purimā ca chāti aṭṭhārasa ācariyagaṇā dutiyatatiyasaṅgītīnaṃ antare jātā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0105n:196_0: Tesu mūlabhūto theravādagaṇoyeva porāṇadhammavinayagaruko hutvā anūnamanadhikaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ
anya-e0105n:196_1: parisuddhaṃ porāṇikaṃ dhammavinayaṃ dhāresi. Itare pana sattarasa bhinnagaṇā porāṇikaṃ
anya-e0105n:196_2: dhammavinayaṃ aññathā akaṃsu. Tena tesaṃ dhammavinayo katthaci ūno katthaci adhiko
anya-e0105n:196_3: hutvā aparipuṇṇo ceva ahosi aparisuddho ca. Tena vuttaṃ dīpavaṃse pañcamaparicchede –
anya-e0105n:199: Aññaṃ pakkhaṃ labhitvāna, adhammavādī bahū janā.
anya-e0105n:207: Aññatra saṅgahitaṃ suttaṃ, aññatra akariṃsu te;
anya-e0105n:208: Atthaṃ dhammañca bhindiṃsu, vinaye nikāyesu ca pañcasu…pe…
anya-e0105n:211: Ganthañca ekadesañhi, chaḍḍetvā aññaṃ akaṃsu te.
anya-e0105n:214: Pakatibhāvaṃ jahitvā, tañca aññaṃ akaṃsu te.
anya-e0105n:224: Bhinnā sattarasa vādā, uppannā jinasāsane”ti kathā. aṭṭha. nidānakathā.
anya-e0105n:225_0: Asokarañño ca kāle parihīnalābhasakkārā aññatitthiyā lābhasakkāraṃ patthayamānā bhikkhūsu
anya-e0105n:225_1: pabbajitvā sakāni sakāni diṭṭhigatāni dīpenti “ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo, idaṃ satthusāsana”nti.
anya-e0105n:225_2: Bhikkhūnaṃ santike pabbajjaṃ alabhamānāpi sayameva kese chinditvā kāsāyāni vatthāni
anya-e0105n:225_3: acchādetvā vihāresu vicarantā uposathakammādikaraṇakāle saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisanti,
anya-e0105n:225_4: te bhikkhusaṅghena dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena niggayhamānāpi dhammavinayānulomāya
anya-e0105n:225_5: paṭipattiyā asaṇṭhahantā anekarūpaṃ sāsanassa abbudañca malañca kaṇṭakañca samuṭṭhāpenti.
anya-e0105n:225_6: Keci aggiṃ paricaranti, keci pañcātape tapanti, keci ādiccaṃ anuparivattanti, keci
anya-e0105n:225_7: dhammañca vinayañca vobhindissāmāti tathā tathā paggaṇhanti. Tadā bhikkhusaṅgho na
anya-e0105n:225_8: tehi saddhiṃ uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā akāsi, asokārāme satta vassāni uposatho upacchijji
anya-e0105n:226_0: Imañca pana pavattiṃ upādāya evampi sakkā gahetuṃ “sattarasannaṃ bhinnavādagaṇānaṃ
anya-e0105n:226_1: dhammavinayassa pacchimakālesu aparisuddhatarabhāvo īdisenapi kāraṇena ahosī”ti.
anya-e0105n:226_2: Kiñcāpi hi buddhasāsanabhūte parisuddhadhammavinaye “kocipi nicco dhuvo sassato nāma
anya-e0105n:226_3: natthi aññatra nibbānadhātuyā, paramatthato attāpi natthi, sabbepi saṅkhārā aniccā
anya-e0105n:226_4: addhuvā asassatā anattāyevā”ti attho ativiya pākaṭo hoti, tathāpi dāni atheravādikānaṃ
anya-e0105n:226_5: ganthesu ca pubbe vetullavādādīsu ca “buddho nicco dhuvo sassato attā”ti ca, “sabbepi
anya-e0105n:226_6: sattā niccā dhuvā sassatā attā”ti ca attho dissati.
anya-e0105n:227_0: Atha asoko dhammarājā sāsanaṃ visodhetukāmo moggaliputtatissattherassa santike paṭhamameva
anya-e0105n:227_1: samayaṃ uggaṇhitvā ekaladdhike ekaladdhike bhikkhū ekato kāretvā ekamekaṃ bhikkhusamūhaṃ
anya-e0105n:227_2: pakkosāpetvā pucchi “kiṃ vādī bhante sammāsambuddho”ti. Tato ye ye “sammāsambuddho
anya-e0105n:227_3: sassatavādī”ti vā, “ekaccasassatavādī”ti vā evamādinā attano attano vādānurūpaṃ micchāvādaṃ
anya-e0105n:227_4: āhaṃsu, te te “nayime bhikkhū, aññatitthiyā ime”ti tathato ñatvā tesaṃ setakāni vatthāni
anya-e0105n:227_5: datvā uppabbājesi. Te sabbepi saṭṭhisahassamattā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0105n:228_0: Athaññe bhikkhū pucchitvā tehi “vibhajjavādī mahārāja sammāsambuddho”ti vutte “suddhaṃ
anya-e0105n:228_1: dāni bhante sāsanaṃ, karotu bhikkhusaṅgho uposatha”nti vatvā ārakkhañca datvā nagaraṃ
anya-e0105n:228_2: pāvisi. Samaggo saṅgho sannipatitvā uposathaṃ akāsi. Tasmiṃ samāgame moggaliputtatissatthero
anya-e0105n:228_3: yāni ca tadā uppannāni vatthūni yāni ca āyatiṃ uppajjissanti, sabbesampi tesaṃ paṭibāhanatthaṃ
anya-e0105n:228_4: satthārā dinnanayavaseneva tathāgatena ṭhapitamātikaṃ vibhajanto parappavādamaddanaṃ
anya-e0105n:228_5: kathāvatthuṃ nāma abhidhammapiṭake pañcamaṃ pakaraṇaṃ abhāsi. Tato moggaliputtatissattherappamukhā
anya-e0105n:228_6: tipiṭakapariyattidharā pabhinnapaṭisambhidāpattā sahassaṃ bhikkhū theravādino saṅgītidvayārūḷhaṃ
anya-e0105n:228_7: parisuddhaṃ porāṇadhammavinayaṃ puna saṅgāyitvā surakkhitaṃ rakkhiṃsu pārā. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n:229_0: Atha moggaliputtatissatthero navasu paccantaṭṭhānesu sāsanapatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ nava
anya-e0105n:229_1: nāyakatthere uccinitvā pesesi. Tesu aṭṭhahi therehi attano attano pattaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
anya-e0105n:229_3: jambudīpato sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā devānaṃpiyatissarājappamukhaṃ dīpakajanasamūhaṃ pasādetvā
anya-e0105n:229_4: buddhasāsanaṃ sampatiṭṭhāpesi, tena ca raññā dinnaṃ mahāmeghavanuyyānaṃ paṭiggahetvā
anya-e0105n:229_5: tattha mahāvihāraṃ nāma saṅghārāmaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi pārā. aṭṭha. 1.tatiyasaṅgītikathā.
anya-e0105n:229_6: Tato pabhuti sīhaḷadīpe buddhasāsanaṃ yāva vaṭṭagāmaṇirājakālā nikāyantaravādākularahitaṃ
anya-e0105n:229_7: nimmalaṃ suparisuddhaṃ hutvā samujjalittha. Vaṭṭagāmaṇirājakālato pana paṭṭhāya nikāyantaravādāpi
anya-e0105n:229_8: sīhaḷadīpamupāgamiṃsu. Tadā visuddhattheravādino yathā purāṇadhammavinayo tehi nikāyantaravādehi
anya-e0105n:229_9: asammisso amalīno pakatiparisuddho hutvā tiṭṭheyya, tathā taṃ mahussāhena surakkhitaṃ rakkhiṃsu. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0105n:231_0: Vaṭṭagāmaṇirājā hi (425-buddhavasse) rajjaṃ patvā pañcamāsamattakāle brāhmaṇatissadāmarikena
anya-e0105n:231_1: sattahi ca damiḷayodhehi upadduto saṅgāme ca parājito palāyitvā sādhikāni cuddasavassāni
anya-e0105n:231_2: nilīyitvā aññataravesena vasati mahāvaṃse 33-paricchede 37-gāthāto paṭṭhāya. Tadā
anya-e0105n:231_3: laṅkādīpe manussā corabhayena dubbhikkhabhayena ca upaddutā bhikkhūnaṃ catūhi paccayehi
anya-e0105n:231_4: upaṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti, tena bhikkhū yebhuyyena tato jambudīpaṃ gantvā dhammavinayaṃ
anya-e0105n:231_5: dhārentā viharanti. Laṅkādīpeyeva ohīnāpi therā yathāladdhehi kandamūlapaṇṇehi yāpentā
anya-e0105n:231_6: kāye vahante nisīditvā pariyattidhammaṃ sajjhāyaṃ karonti, avahante vālukaṃ ussāpetvā
anya-e0105n:231_7: taṃ parivāretvā sīsāni ekaṭṭhāne katvā pariyattiṃ sammasanti. Evaṃ dvādasa saṃvaccharāni
anya-e0105n:231_8: sāṭṭhakathaṃ tepiṭakaṃ ahāpetvā dhārayiṃsu. Yadā pana vaṭṭagāmaṇirājā damiḷarājānaṃ
anya-e0105n:231_9: hantvā (455-466 buddhavassabbhantare) punapi rajjaṃ kāresi mahāvaṃse 33, 78-gāthā.
anya-e0105n:231_10: Tadā te therā jambudīpato paccāgatattherehi saddhiṃ tepiṭakaṃ sodhentā ekakkharampi
anya-e0105n:231_11: asamentaṃ nāma na passiṃsu a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.130; vibha. aṭṭha. 810. Yopi ca mahāniddeso
anya-e0105n:231_12: tasmiṃ kāle ekasseva dussīlabhikkhuno paguṇo ahosi, sopi mahātipiṭakattherena mahārakkhitattheraṃ
anya-e0105n:231_13: tassa santikā uggaṇhāpetvā rakkhito ahosi pārā. aṭṭha. 2.585. Evaṃ dubbhikkharaṭṭhakkhobhupaddavehi
anya-e0105n:232_0: Rājā abhayagiriṃ nāma vihāraṃ kāretvā attano katūpakārapubbassa mahātissattherassa
anya-e0105n:232_1: adāsi. So pana thero kulasaṃsaggabahulattā mahāvihāravāsīhi bhikkhūhi pabbājanīyakammaṃ
anya-e0105n:232_2: katvā nīhaṭo. Tadāssa sisso bahalamassutissanāmako thero taṃ kammaṃ paṭibāhi, tenassa
anya-e0105n:232_3: saṅgho ukkhepanīyakammaṃ akāsi. So mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ kujjhitvā abhayagirivihārameva
anya-e0105n:232_4: gantvā tena mahātissattherena ekato hutvā visuṃ gaṇaṃ vahanto vasi. Te ca dve therā
anya-e0105n:232_5: na mahāvihāraṃ punāgamiṃsu mahāvaṃse 33, 79-gāthādīsu. nikāyasaṅgahe. Tato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0105n:232_6: sīhaḷadīpe mahāvihāravāsī, abhayagirivāsīti dve nikāyājātā. Idaṃ tāva sīhaḷadīpe
anya-e0105n:234_0: Tadā ca rājā abhayagirivāsīsuyeva bhikkhūsu visesato pasanno hutvā teyeva catūhi
anya-e0105n:234_1: paccayehi pavāretvā paggaṇhāti, rājamahāmattādayopi abhiññātā abhiññātā bahū janā
anya-e0105n:234_2: tasmiñca ārāme aññattha ca bahū āvāse katvā tesaṃ denti. Evaṃ abhayagirivāsino bhikkhū
anya-e0105n:234_3: bahūnaṃ abhiññātajanānaṃ sakkatā ceva honti pūjitā ca mānitā ca. Puna ca abhayagirivāsino
anya-e0105n:234_5: dhammavinayabhūtaṃ sakkatabhāsāropitaṃ abhinavampi piṭakaṃ sampaṭicchanti mahāvaṃse
anya-e0105n:234_6: 33, 99 gāthāsu. nikāyasaṅgahe, tena tepi dhammarucinikāyikā nāma ahesuṃ. Idaṃ sīhaḷadīpe
anya-e0105n:236_0: Mahāvihāravāsino pana porāṇikaṃ pāḷibhāsāya saṇṭhitaṃ parisuddhapiṭakameva paṭiggaṇhanti,
anya-e0105n:236_1: tañca mukhapāṭheneva dhārenti. Tadā pana therā pacchimajanānaṃ satipaññāhāniṃ disvā
anya-e0105n:236_2: buddhakālato paṭṭhāya yāva taṃkālā mukhapāṭhenābhataṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ piṭakattayaṃ potthake
anya-e0105n:236_3: āropetuṃ samārabhiṃsu. Samārabhamānā ca te anurādharājadhānipurato aṭṭhasaṭṭhimilappamāṇe
anya-e0105n:236_4: malayajanapade mātula mātale iti etarahi vohāro nagare ālokaleṇe vasantā ekassa tandesikassa
anya-e0105n:236_5: janapadādhipatino ārakkhaṃ gahetvā taṃ potthakāropanakammamakaṃsu mahāvaṃse 33, 100-101-gāthāsu.
anya-e0105n:236_6: Tenidaṃ ñāyati “tadā mahāvihāravāsino therā rājarājamahāmattehi aladdhūpakārā hutvā
anya-e0105n:236_7: attano baleneva piṭakattayassa potthakāropanakammamakaṃsū”ti ca, “tañca yatheva pacchimajanānaṃ
anya-e0105n:236_10: kata”nti ca. Evaṃ mahāvihāravāsino therā parisuddhattheravādapiṭakaṃ samayantarehi
anya-e0105n:236_11: asammissanatthāya yathā pure, tathā pāḷibhāsāya eva potthake āropetvāpi surakkhitaṃ
anya-e0105n:236_12: rakkhiṃsu. Yadi hi tadā tepiṭakaṃ potthakesu anāropitamassa, pacchākālesu samayantarato
anya-e0105n:236_13: āgatasuttāni “netāni amhāka”nti paṭikkhipituṃ na sukarāni bhaveyyuṃ. Yato ca kho
anya-e0105n:236_14: tadā sāṭṭhakathaṃ tepiṭakaṃ potthakesu āropitaṃ, tatoyeva anāgatakālesu samayantarāgatasuttāni
anya-e0105n:236_15: tehi potthakehi saṃsandetvā paṭikkhipituṃ sukarāni honti.
anya-e0105n:237_0: Tathā hi bhātiyarājakāle (524-552-bu-va) mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ abhayagirivāsīhi vinaye
anya-e0105n:237_1: vivādo uppajji. Tadā rājā dīghakārāyanaṃ nāma brāhmaṇajātikaṃ amaccaṃ therānaṃ santikaṃ
anya-e0105n:237_2: pesesi. So ubhinnaṃ suttaṃ sutvā vinicchayaṃ adāsi pārā. aṭṭha. 2.384. Tathā vohārakatissarājakāle
anya-e0105n:237_3: ca (758-780 bu-va) goṭhābhayarājakāle ca (797-810 bu-va) theravādikā potthakārūḷhena
anya-e0105n:239_0: Ayaṃ pana ādito paṭṭhāya sāsanamalabhūtānaṃ adhammavādānaṃ uppatti. Asokarañño hi
anya-e0105n:239_1: kāle uppabbājetvā nikkaḍḍhitā aññatitthiyā buddhasāsane aladdhapatiṭṭhā kodhābhibhūtā
anya-e0105n:239_2: pāṭaliputtato nikkhamitvā rājagahasamīpe nālandāyaṃ sannipatitvā evaṃ sammantayiṃsu
anya-e0105n:239_3: “mahājanassa buddhasāsane anavagāhatthāya sakyānaṃ dhammavinayo nāsetabbo, tañca
anya-e0105n:239_4: kho tesaṃ samayaṃ ajānantehi na sakkā kātuṃ, tasmā yena kenaci upāyena punapi tattha
anya-e0105n:239_5: pabbajitabbamevā”ti. Te evaṃ sammantayitvā puna āgantvā visuddhattheravādīnamantaraṃ
anya-e0105n:239_6: pavisituṃ asakkontā tadaññesaṃ sattarasannaṃ mahāsaṅghikādinikāyānaṃ santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0105n:239_7: attano aññatitthiyabhāvaṃ ajānāpetvā pabbajitvā piṭakattayamuggaṇhitvā tañca viparivattetvā
anya-e0105n:239_8: tato kosambiṃ gantvā dhammavinayanāsanāya upāyaṃ mantayitvā 253-buddhavasse chasu
anya-e0105n:239_9: ṭhānesu vasantā (1) hemavatiko (2) rājagiriko (3) siddhatthiko (4) pubbaseliyo (5)
anya-e0105n:239_10: aparaseliyo (6) vājiriyo (7) vetullo (8) andhako (9) aññamahāsaṅghikoti nava abhinave
anya-e0105n:239_11: nikāye uppādesuṃ nikāyasaṅgahe 9-piṭṭhe. Tesaṃ nāmāni ca laddhiyo ca kathāvatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatāyeva.
anya-e0105n:246: Vajirapabbatavāsino vājiriyā (6) gūḷhavinayaṃ nāma ganthaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e0105n:247: Teyeva sabbe māyājālatanta-samājatantādike aneke tantaganthe ca, marīcikappa-herambhakappādike aneke kappaganthe ca akaṃsu.
anya-e0105n:251_0: Tesu pana saddhammapatirūpakesu vetullavādo, vājiriyavādo, ratanakūṭasatthanti imāniyeva
anya-e0105n:251_1: tīṇi laṅkādīpamupāgatāni, aññāni pana vaṇṇapiṭakādīni jambudīpeyeva nivattantīti
anya-e0105n:251_2: nikāyasaṅgahe vuttaṃ. Vaṇṇapiṭakādīnampi pana laṅkādīpamupāgatacchāyā dissateva.
anya-e0105n:252_1: gūḷhavinaya vedallapiṭakāni ettha “vepulla, vedallaṃ, vetullanti atthako ekaṃ, bodhisattapiṭakasseva
anya-e0105n:252_2: nāma”nti veditabbaṃ. tathā hi vuttaṃ asaṅgena nāma ācariyena abhidhammasamuccaye
anya-e0105n:252_4: yaduccate vepullaṃ, taṃ vedallamapyuccate, vetullamapyuccate. kimatthaṃ vepullamuccate?
anya-e0105n:252_6: vedallaṃ? sabbāvaraṇavidalanato. kimatthamuccate vetullaṃ? upamānadhammānaṃ tulanābhāvato”ti
anya-e0105n:254: “Gūḷhavinayaṃ gūḷhavessantaraṃ gūḷhamahosadhaṃ vaṇṇapiṭakaṃ aṅgulimālapiṭakaṃ raṭṭhapālagajjitaṃ āḷavakagajjitaṃ vedallapiṭakanti abuddhavacanaṃ saddhammapatirūpakaṃ nāmā”ti ca–
anya-e0105n:255_0: Tesaṃ paṭikkhepo dissati. Na hi tāni asutvā, tesañca atthaṃ ajānitvā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathācariyehi
anya-e0105n:255_1: tāni paṭikkhipituṃ sakkā, nāpi taṃ paṭikkhepavacanaṃ jambudīpikaṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ
anya-e0105n:255_2: vacanaṃ bhavituṃ, mahāmahindattherassa sīhaḷadīpaṃ gamanasamaye tesaṃyeva abhāvato.
anya-e0105n:255_3: Tasmā tāni ca tadaññāni ca mahāyānikapiṭakāni taṃkālikāni yebhuyyena sīhaḷadīpamupāgatānīti
anya-e0105n:255_4: gahetabbāni. Tesu ca vajjiputtakagaṇapariyāpannassa dhammarucinikāyassa piṭakānaṃ
anya-e0105n:255_5: tadupāgamanaṃ pubbeva vuttaṃ. Tadaññesaṃ pana tadupāgamanaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0105n:257_2: vetullapiṭakaṃ sampaṭiggahetvā “idaṃ buddhabhāsita”nti dassenti. Taṃ mahāvihāravāsino
anya-e0105n:257_3: theravādikā dhammavinayena saṃsandetvā adhammavādoti paṭikkhipiṃsu. Taṃ sutvā rājā
anya-e0105n:257_4: sabbasatthapāraguṃ kapilaṃ nāma amaccaṃ pesetvā vinicchayaṃ kārāpetvā abuddhabhāsitabhāvaṃ
anya-e0105n:257_5: ñatvā sabbaṃ vetullapotthakaṃ jhāpetvā talladdhike ca pāpabhikkhū niggahetvā buddhasāsanaṃ
anya-e0105n:260: Kapilena amaccena, sāsanaṃ jotayī ca so”ti.
anya-e0105n:262_0: Punapi te abhayagirivāsino goṭhābhayarañño kāle (797-810-bu-va) vetullavādaṃ tatheva
anya-e0105n:262_1: dassenti. Tadā pana tesu ussiliyātisso nāma mahāthero vohārakatissarājakāle vetullavādīnaṃ
anya-e0105n:262_2: bhikkhūnaṃ kataniggahaṃ sutvā “vicāraṇasampannassa rañño samaye tatheva bhaveyya,
anya-e0105n:262_3: na bhaddakameta”nti cintetvā “na mayaṃ tehi ekato homā”ti tisatamatte bhikkhū gahetvā
anya-e0105n:262_4: dakkhiṇagirivihāraṃ gantvā dhammarucinikāyato visuṃ hutvā vasi. Tesu sāgalo nāma
anya-e0105n:262_5: mahāthero tattheva dakkhiṇagirimhi vasanto āgamabyākhyānamakāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ
anya-e0105n:262_6: theramārabbha tassantevāsino sāgaliyā nāma ahesuṃ. Tesampi vādo pacchā mahāsenarājakāle
anya-e0105n:264_0: Goṭhābhayo pana rājā pañcasu mahāvihāra, cetiya, thūpārāma, issarasamaṇaka, vessagirivihārasaṅkhātesu
anya-e0105n:264_1: vihāresu mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ ekato sannipātetvā taṃ pavattiṃ pucchitvā vetullavādassa
anya-e0105n:264_2: abuddhabhāsitabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃvādino saṭṭhi pāpabhikkhū lakkhaṇāhate katvā raṭṭhato
anya-e0105n:264_3: pabbājesi, vetullapotthakāni ca jhāpetvā buddhasāsanaṃ jotesi mahāvaṃse 36, 111-112-gāthāsu, nikāya 13-piṭṭhe.
anya-e0105n:265_0: Tadā raṭṭhato pabbājitesu tesu bhikkhūsu keci kāvīrapaṭṭanaṃ gantvā tattha vasanti.
anya-e0105n:265_1: Tasmiñca samaye eko aññatitthiyamāṇavako desantarato kāvīramāgantvā paṭṭanagāmikehi
anya-e0105n:265_2: tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ katūpahāraṃ disvā lābhasakkāraṃ nissāya tesaṃ santike pabbajitvā
anya-e0105n:265_3: saṅghamittoti nāmena pākaṭo ahosi. So mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ dhammavinicchayaṃ nissāya
anya-e0105n:265_4: goṭhābhayaraññā vetullavādahetu tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ raṭṭhā pabbājitabhāvaṃ ñatvā mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ
anya-e0105n:265_5: kuddho hutvā “vetullavādaṃ vā ne gāhāpessāmi, vihāre vā nesaṃ ummūletvā vināsessāmī”ti
anya-e0105n:265_6: sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ pasādetvā tassa dve putte sippaṃ sikkhāpessāmīti ārabhi.
anya-e0105n:265_7: Tathāpi attano vādassa jānanasamatthaṃ jeṭṭhatissaṃ ohāya anāgate attano vacanaṃ
anya-e0105n:265_8: kārāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ kaniṭṭhaṃ mahāsenakumārameva saṅgaṇhitvā sippaṃ sikkhāpesi.
anya-e0105n:265_9: Vituno accayena jeṭṭhatissakumāre rajjaṃ patte (810-819-bu-va) so tassa rañño bhīto
anya-e0105n:266_0: Mahāsenarañño pana kāle (819-845-bu-va) so puna sīhaḷadīpamāgantvā abhayagirivihāre
anya-e0105n:266_1: vasanto mahāvihāravāsīhi vetullavādaṃ gāhāpetuṃ nānāpakārehi vāyāmamakāsi. Tathāpi
anya-e0105n:266_2: tehi taṃ gāhāpetuṃ asakkonto rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nānākāraṇehi saññāpetvā “yo koci
anya-e0105n:266_3: ekassapi bhikkhussa mahāvihāravāsino āhāraṃ dadeyya, tassa sataṃ daṇḍo”ti rañño āṇāya
anya-e0105n:266_4: nagare bheriṃ carāpesi. Tadā mahāvihāravāsino nagare piṇḍāya carantā tayo divase
anya-e0105n:266_5: bhikkhamaladdhā mahāpāsāde sannipatitvā “sace mayaṃ khudāhetu adhammaṃ dhammoti gaṇheyyāma,
anya-e0105n:266_6: bahū janā taṃ gahetvā apāyagāmino bhavissanti, mayañca sabbe sāvajjā bhavissāma,
anya-e0105n:266_7: tasmā na mayaṃ jīvitahetupi vetullavādaṃ paṭiggaṇhissāmā”ti sammantayitvā mahāvihārādike
anya-e0105n:266_8: sabbavihāre chaḍḍetvā rohaṇajanapadañca malayapadesañca agamiṃsu mahāvaṃse 37, 2-6-gāthāsu.
anya-e0105n:268_0: Kīdiso vetullavādo nāma, yato mahāvihāravāsino ativiya jigucchiṃsūti? Idāni vetullavādassa
anya-e0105n:268_1: sarūpaṃ sabbākārena pakāsetuṃ na sakkā, vetullanāmena potthakānaṃ vā nikāyassa vā
anya-e0105n:268_2: etarahi apākaṭabhāvato. Abhidhammapiṭake pana kathāvatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ kathā. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n:269: “Paramatthato maggaphalāneva saṅgho, maggaphalehi añño saṅgho nāma natthi, maggaphalāni ca na kiñci paṭiggaṇhanti, tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggaṇhātī”ti ca (1).
anya-e0105n:270: “Maggaphalāneva saṅgho nāma, na ca tāni dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetuṃ sakkonti, tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetī”ti ca (2).
anya-e0105n:271: “Maggaphalāneva saṅgho nāma, na ca tāni kiñci bhuñjanti, tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho bhuñjati pivati khādati sāyatī”ti ca (3).
anya-e0105n:272_0: Maggaphalāneva saṅgho nāma, na ca sakkā tesaṃ kiñci dātuṃ, na ca tehi paṭiggaṇhituṃ,
anya-e0105n:272_1: nāpi tesaṃ dānena koci upakāro ijjhati, tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti ca (4).
anya-e0105n:273: “Buddho bhagavā na kiñci paribhuñjati, lokānuvattanatthaṃ pana paribhuñjamānaṃ viya attānaṃ dasseti, tasmā nirupakārattā na vattabbaṃ tasmiṃ dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti ca (5).
anya-e0105n:274: “Bhagavā tusitabhavane nibbatto tattheva vasati, na manussalokaṃ āgacchati, nimmitarūpamattakaṃ panettha dassetī”ti ca (6).
anya-e0105n:275: “Tusitapure ṭhito bhagavā dhammadesanatthāya abhinimmitaṃ pesesi, tena ceva, tassa ca desanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā āyasmatā ānandena dhammo desito, na buddhena bhagavatā”ti ca (7).
anya-e0105n:276_0: “Ekādhippāyena methuno dhammo paṭisevitabbo. Ayaṃ panettha attho – kāruññena vā ekena
anya-e0105n:276_1: adhippāyena ekādhippāyo, saṃsāre vā ekato bhavissāmāti itthiyā saddhiṃ buddhapūjādīni
anya-e0105n:276_2: katvā paṇidhivasena eko adhippāyo assāti ekādhippāyo, evarūpo dvinnampi janānaṃ ekādhippāyo
anya-e0105n:276_3: methuno dhammo paṭisevitabbo”ti ca (8) evaṃ vetullavādīnaṃ laddhiyo āgatā, ettakāyeva
anya-e0105n:277_0: Ettha ca ādito catūhi vādehi suttantāgatasaṅgho ca micchā gahito, vinayāgatasaṅgho
anya-e0105n:277_1: ca sabbathā paṭikkhitto. Tadanantaraṃ tayo vādā issaranimmānavādānuvattakā. Antimassa
anya-e0105n:278_0: Abhidhammasamuccaye pana vetullapiṭakassa bodhisattapiṭakabhāvo pakāsito, tasmā saddhammapuṇḍarikasuttādike
anya-e0105n:280_0: Mahāvihāravāsīsu pana vuttappakārena sabbavihāre chaḍḍetvā gatesu saṅghamitto pāpabhikkhu
anya-e0105n:280_1: rājānaṃ saññāpetvā lohapāsādādike catusaṭṭhyādhike tisatamatte pariveṇapāsāde nāsetvā
anya-e0105n:280_2: samūlaṃ uddharāpetvā abhayagirivihāraṃ ānayāpesi. Vihārabhūmiyañca kasāpetvā aparaṇṇe
anya-e0105n:280_3: vapāpesi. Evaṃ tadā mahāvihāro nava vassāni bhikkhūhi suñño ahosi āvāsavirahito ca.
anya-e0105n:280_4: Atha rājā meghavaṇṇābhayassa nāma kalyāṇamittabhūtassa amaccassa santajjanapubbaṅgamena
anya-e0105n:280_5: vacanena mahāvihāraṃ puna pākatikaṃ katvā te cāpi apakkante bhikkhū ānetvā catūhi
anya-e0105n:282_0: Punapi rājā dakkhiṇārāmavāsimhi jimhamānase kuhakatissatthere pasanno hutvā tassatthāya
anya-e0105n:282_2: bhikkhū taṃ nivāretuṃ asakkontā punapi tato apakkamiṃsu. Tadāpi mahāvihāro nava māsāni
anya-e0105n:282_3: bhikkhūhi suñño ahosi. Rājā pana attano ajjhāsayavaseneva tattha jetavanavihāraṃ
anya-e0105n:282_4: kāretvā tassa kuhakatissattherassa adāsiyeva. Tattha dakkhiṇagirivihārato sāgaliyā
anya-e0105n:282_5: bhikkhū āgantvā vasiṃsu. Pacchā ca te ambasāmaṇerasilākālarañño kāle (1067-1080-bu-va)
anya-e0105n:283_2: jetavanavāsino (829-845-bu-va) cāti tayo nikāyā uppannā ahesuṃ. Tesu pana abhayagirivāsinoyeva
anya-e0105n:283_3: visesato pākaṭā ceva honti balavanto ca. Tathā hi te visuddhattheravādapiṭakañca
anya-e0105n:283_5: sampaṭicchanti. Tesu dhammarucinikāyapiṭakassa sampaṭicchitabhāvo pākaṭoyeva. Mahisāsakādinikāyapiṭakassa
anya-e0105n:283_7: ceva aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittavaṇṇapiṭakādināmavasena ca veditabbo, tathā mahāyānapiṭakassa
anya-e0105n:285_1: mahisāsakavinayapiṭakañca dīghāgamo ca saṃyuttāgamo ca sannipātapiṭakañca attanā
anya-e0105n:285_2: saha cinaraṭṭhamānītanti tassa addhānakkamakathāyaṃ dassitaṃ. Tañca sabbaṃ abhayagirivihāratoyeva
anya-e0105n:285_4: ca tattheva bhaveyyuṃ, mahāvihāravāsīhi tesaṃ appaṭiggahitabhāvato. Tathā “phāhiyambhikkhussa
anya-e0105n:285_5: sīhaḷadīpe paṭivasanakāle (954-956-bu-va) mahāvihāre tisahassamattā bhikkhū vasanti,
anya-e0105n:285_6: te theravādapiṭakameva uggaṇhanti, na mahāyānapiṭakaṃ. Abhayagirivihāre pañcasahassamattā
anya-e0105n:285_7: bhikkhū vasanti, te pana dvepi piṭakāni uggaṇhanti mahāyānapiṭakañceva theravādapiṭakañcā”ti
anya-e0105n:286_0: Yasmā pana abhayagirivāsino mahāyānapiṭakampi uggaṇhanti, tasmā tasmiṃ vihāre mahāyānikānaṃ
anya-e0105n:286_2: tatoyeva tesaṃ nayañca nāmañca ācariyabuddhaghosattheropi aññepi taṃkālikā mahāvihāravāsino
anya-e0105n:286_3: sutasampannā therā jāneyyuṃyeva. Apica dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe samuddasamīpe guntājanapade
anya-e0105n:286_4: nāgārajunakoṇḍaṃ nāma ṭhānamatthi, yattha nāgajjuno mahāyānikānaṃ padhānācariyabhūto
anya-e0105n:286_5: vasanto buddhasāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Ācariyabuddhaghosassa ca tandesikabhāvanimittaṃ
anya-e0105n:286_6: dissati, taṃ pacchato (33-piṭṭhe) āvibhavissati. Tasmāpi ācariyabuddhaghosatthero
anya-e0105n:286_7: nāgajjunassa ca assaghosassa ca nayañca nāmañca jāneyyayevāti sakkā anuminituṃ.
anya-e0105n:287_0: Jānatoyeva pana tesaṃ nayassa vā nāmassa vā attano aṭṭhakathāyamappakāsanaṃ tesaṃ
anya-e0105n:287_1: nikāyantarabhāvatoyevassa. Tathā hi tesaṃ assaghosanāgajjunānaṃ assaghoso (570-670-buddhavassabbhantare)
anya-e0105n:287_2: theravādato bhinnesu ekādasasu gaṇesu sabbatthivādagaṇe pariyāpanno, nāgajjuno ca
anya-e0105n:287_4: ca āditoyeva paṭṭhāya nikāyantarasamayehi asammissanatthaṃ attano piṭakaṃ atīva ādaraṃ
anya-e0105n:287_5: katvā rakkhanti, ayañca ācariyabuddhaghoso tesamaññataro. Vuttañhi tassa ganthanigamanesu
anya-e0105n:287_7: jānantoyeva attano ganthesu nikāyantarasamayehi asammissanatthaṃ nappakāsesī”ti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0105n:288_0: Ettāvatā ca yāni “bodhimaṇḍasamīpamhi, jāto brāhmaṇamāṇavo”tiādinā vuttassa mahāvaṃsavacanassa
anya-e0105n:288_2: tāni amūlakabhāvena anuvicāritāni. Tathāpi “ācariyabuddhaghoso bodhimaṇḍasamīpe jāto”ti
anya-e0105n:288_3: etaṃ pana atthaṃ sādhetuṃ daḷhakāraṇaṃ na dissateva ṭhapetvā taṃ mahāvaṃsavacanaṃ,
anya-e0105n:288_4: yampi buddhaghosuppattiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi mahāvaṃsameva nissāya vuttavacanattā na
anya-e0105n:290_0: Ekacce pana marammaraṭṭhikā “ācariyabuddhaghoso marammaraṭṭhe sathuṃ nāma nagarato
anya-e0105n:290_1: sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā saṅgahaṭṭhakathāyo akāsī”ti vadanti. Taṃ dhammānandena anujānitvā
anya-e0105n:290_2: “tampi thokaṃ yuttisampannaṃ, ahaṃ evaṃ saddahāmi ‘buddhaghoso dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe
anya-e0105n:290_3: telaṅgajātiko’ti, telaṅgajātikā ca bahū janā marammaraṭṭhe ca indocina raṭṭhe ca
anya-e0105n:290_4: gantvā vasanti, talhiṅa? Iti vohāro ca tatoyeva telaṅgapadato uppanno. Tathā ‘buddhaghoso
anya-e0105n:290_5: aṭṭhakathāyo katvā sīhaḷadīpato marammaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā pacchimabhāge tattheva vasī’tipi
anya-e0105n:290_6: gahetuṃ sakkā, tassa hi ganthā marammaraṭṭhe sīhaḷaraṭṭhatopi surakkhitatarā hontī”ti
anya-e0105n:292_0: Bahū pana ādhunikā vicakkhaṇā dhammānandādayo “ācariyabuddhaghosatthero dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhiko”ti
anya-e0105n:292_1: vadanti. Ayaṃ panettha yutti, yebhuyyena hi aṭṭhakathāṭīkākārā therā dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhikāyeva.
anya-e0105n:292_2: Tathā hi buddhavaṃsaṭṭhakathāya ca abhidhammāvatāraṭṭhakathāya ca vinayavinicchayaṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0105n:292_3: ca kārako ācariyabuddhadattatthero coḷaraṭṭhe tambapaṇṇinadiyaṃ uraganagare jāto
anya-e0105n:292_5: kārako ācariyaanuruddhatthero ekacce pana vadanti-paramatthavinicchayakārako eko,
anya-e0105n:292_9: veditabbo. Vuttañhi manorathapūraṇiyā nāma aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāya nigamane –
anya-e0105n:295: Ettha ca kañcipuraṃ nāma madarasanagarassa īsakaṃ pacchimanissite dakkhiṇadisābhāge pañcacattālīsamilappamāṇe padese idāni kañjīvara iti voharitanagarameva.
anya-e0105n:298: Pubbe mayūradūta mayūrarūpa (sī.), mayūrasutta (syā.) paṭṭanamhi saddhiṃ vasantenā”ti – vuttaṃ.
anya-e0105n:299: Ettha ca mayūradūtapaṭṭanaṃ nāma idāni madarasanagarasamīpe milapora iti voharitaṭṭhānanti porāṇappavattigavesīhi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0105n:300_0: Imāhi pana nigamanagāthāhi dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭheyeva nivutthapubbataṃ pakāseti, bodhimaṇḍasamīpe
anya-e0105n:300_1: vā, marammaraṭṭhe vā nivutthapubbatāya pakāsanañca na dissati. Tena ācariyabuddhaghoso
anya-e0105n:300_2: dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhiko na hotīti na sakkā paṭikkhipituṃ.
anya-e0105n:302_0: “Yaṃ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘aparikkhitte pamukhe anāpattīti bhūmiyaṃ vinā jagatiyā
anya-e0105n:302_1: pamukhaṃ sandhāya kathita’nti vuttaṃ, taṃ andhakaraṭṭhe pāṭekkasannivesā ekacchadanā
anya-e0105n:303_0: Iminā pana vacanena “andhakaṭṭhakathā andhakaraṭṭhikehi therehi katā”ti pākaṭā hoti,
anya-e0105n:303_2: suṭṭhu jānāti, tasmā tandesiko na hotīti na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0105n:304_0: Tathā imassapi visuddhimaggassa nigamane – “moraṇḍakheṭakavattabbenā”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha
anya-e0105n:304_1: ca kheṭoti padassa gāmoti vā, jānapadānaṃ kassakānaṃ nivāsoti vā, khuddakanagaranti
anya-e0105n:304_2: vā tayo atthā sakkatābhidhāne pakāsitā, dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhesu ca yāvajjatanāpi gāmo
anya-e0105n:304_3: kheḍāti voharīyati. Tasmā moraṇḍavhaye kheṭe jāto moraṇḍakheṭako, moraṇḍakheṭako
anya-e0105n:304_4: iti vattabbo moraṇḍakheṭakavattabbo, tena moraṇḍakheṭakavattabbenāti vacanatthaṃ
anya-e0105n:304_5: katvā “moraṇḍagāme jātoti vattabbena therenā”ti attho gahetabbo. Idāni pana dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe
anya-e0105n:304_6: guntājanapade nāgārajunakoṇḍato ekapaṇṇāsamilamatte (51) amaravatito ca aṭṭhapaṇṇāsamilamatte
anya-e0105n:304_7: (58) padese kotanemalipurīti ca gundalapallīti ca voharitaṃ ṭhānadvayamatthi, tattha
anya-e0105n:304_8: ca bahūni buddhasāsanikaporāṇasantakāni diṭṭhāni, nemalīti telaguvohāro ca morassa,
anya-e0105n:304_9: gundalu iti ca aṇḍassa, tasmā taṃ ṭhānadvayameva pubbe moraṇḍakheṭoti voharito ācariyabuddhaghosassa
anya-e0105n:304_10: jātigāmo bhaveyyāti porāṇaṭṭhānagavesīhi gahito. Yasmā panetaṃ “moraṇḍakheṭakavattabbenā”ti
anya-e0105n:304_11: padaṃ “moraṇḍagāmajātenā”ti padaṃ viya pāḷinayānucchavikaṃ na hoti, aññehi ca bahūhi
anya-e0105n:304_12: visesanapadehi ekato aṭṭhatvā visesyapadassa pacchato visuṃ ṭhitaṃ, āgamaṭṭhakathādīsu
anya-e0105n:304_13: ca na dissati, tasmā etaṃ kenaci taṃkālikena ācariyassa jātiṭṭhānaṃ sañjānantena
anya-e0105n:305_0: Imesu pana tīsu “ācariyabuddhaghoso bodhimaṇḍasamīpe jātoti ca marammaraṭṭhikoti
anya-e0105n:305_1: ca dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhiko”ti ca vuttavacanesu pacchimameva balavataraṃ hoti ācariyasseva
anya-e0105n:305_2: vacananissitattā, tasmā tadeva nissāya ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa uppatti evaṃ veditabbā.
anya-e0105n:307_1: moraṇḍagāme brāhmaṇakule jāto, so tīsu vedesu ceva sabbavijjāsippaganthesu ca pāraṅgato
anya-e0105n:307_2: hutvā buddhasāsanadhammaṃ sutvā tampi uggaṇhitukāmo tasmiṃyeva dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe
anya-e0105n:307_3: ekasmiṃ theravādikavihāre mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ revatattherappamukhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike
anya-e0105n:307_4: pabbajjañceva upasampadañca gaṇhitvā piṭakattayapāḷimuggaṇhi. So evaṃ piṭakattayapāḷimuggaṇhantoyeva
anya-e0105n:307_6: ca tassa visiṭṭhañāṇappabhāvasampannabhāvaṃ ñatvā “imassa buddhasāsane kittighoso
anya-e0105n:307_7: buddhassa viya pavattissatī”ti sampassamānā “buddhaghoso”ti nāmamakaṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ
anya-e0105n:308_0: So evaṃ piṭakattayapāḷimuggaṇhitvā madarasa nagarasamīpaṭṭhānabhūte mayūradūtapaṭṭanamhi
anya-e0105n:308_1: ca kañcipurādīsu ca vasanto andhakaṭṭhakathāya paricayaṃ katvā tāya asantuṭṭhacitto
anya-e0105n:308_2: sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsupi paricayaṃ kātukāmo tā ca pāḷibhāsamāropetvā abhinavīkātumāsīsanto
anya-e0105n:308_3: sīhaḷadīpamagamāsi. Tasmiñca kāle sīhaḷadīpe mahānāmo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāreti, so
anya-e0105n:308_4: ca rājā abhayagirivāsīsu pasanno teyeva visesato paggaṇhāti.
anya-e0105n:309_0: Ekacce pana ādhunikā vicakkhaṇā evaṃ vadanti “ācariyabuddhaghosassa sīhaḷadīpāgamanena
anya-e0105n:309_1: sirimeghavaṇṇarājakālato (846-bu-va) puretaraṃyeva bhavitabba”nti. Idañca nesaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0105n:309_2: tassa rañño navavassakāle (855-bu-va) buddhassa dāṭhādhātukaliṅgaraṭṭhato sīhaḷadīpamānītā,
anya-e0105n:309_3: tato paṭṭhāya sīhaḷarājāno anusaṃvaccharaṃ mahantaṃ dhātupūjāussavaṃ karonti. Yadi
anya-e0105n:309_4: ca ācariyabuddhaghoso tato pacchā sīhaḷadīpamāgaccheyya, tampi pāsādikaṃ mahussavaṃ
anya-e0105n:309_5: disvā attano ganthesu pakāseyya yathā phāhiyaṃ nāma cinabhikkhu mahānāmarājakāle
anya-e0105n:309_6: (953-975-bu-va) taṃ disvā attano addhānakkamakathāyaṃ pakāsesi, na pana ācariyassa
anya-e0105n:309_7: ganthesu taṃpakāsanā dissati, tenetaṃ ñāyati “ācariyabuddhaghoso dāṭhādhātusampattakālato
anya-e0105n:309_8: (855-bu-va) puretaraṃyeva sīhaḷadīpamāgantvā aṭṭhakathāyo akāsī”ti. Taṃ pana na daḷhakāraṇaṃ
anya-e0105n:309_9: hoti, tipiṭakapāḷiyā hi atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya yaṃ vā taṃ vā attano paccakkhadiṭṭhaṃ pakāsetabbaṃ
anya-e0105n:309_10: na hoti, na ca atthasaṃvaṇṇanā addhānakkamakathāsadisā. Kiñca bhiyyo, samantapāsādikāya
anya-e0105n:309_11: vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ dīpavaṃsatopi kiñci ānetvā pakāsitaṃ, dīpavaṃse ca yāva mahāsenarājakālā
anya-e0105n:309_13: dīpavaṃsoyeva likhito na bhaveyya. Yadi ca aṭṭhakathāyo tato pubbeyeva katā bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0105n:310: Ācariyabuddhaghoso pana sīhaḷadīpaṃ pattakāle (965-bu-va) mahāvihārameva gantvā tattha sīhaḷamahātherānaṃ santike sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo suṇi. Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ –
anya-e0105n:314: Vinayaññussa dhīrassa, sutvā therassa santike”ti pari. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n:315_0: Iminā pana aṭṭhakathāvacanena mahāaṭṭhakathādīnaṃ tissannaṃyeva aṭṭhakathānaṃ sutabhāvo
anya-e0105n:315_1: dassito. Samantapāsādikāyaṃ pana saṅkhepaandhakaṭṭhakathānampi vinicchayo dassitoyeva,
anya-e0105n:315_2: kasmā pana tā ācariyena sīhaḷattherānaṃ santike na sutāti? Tāsu hi andhakaṭṭhakathā
anya-e0105n:315_3: tāva andhakaraṭṭhikabhāvato, kataparicayabhāvato ca na sutāti pākaṭoyevāyamattho.
anya-e0105n:315_4: Saṅkhepaṭṭhakathā pana mahāpaccariṭṭhakathāya saṃkhittamattabhāvato na sutāti veditabbā.
anya-e0105n:315_5: Tathā hi vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ ganthārambhasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vijira. ṭī. ganthārambhakathāvaṇṇanā
anya-e0105n:315_7: sārattha. ṭī. 1.92 pācittiyakaṇḍa; vi. vi. ṭī. 1.ganthārambhakathāvaṇṇanā pana andhakasaṅkhepaṭṭhakathānaṃ
anya-e0105n:315_8: saṅgahitabhāvo vutto, samantapāsādikāyañca cūḷapaccarīti nāmaṃ kuhiñcipi na dissati,
anya-e0105n:315_9: mahāṭṭhakathā mahāpaccarī kurundī andhakasaṅkhepaṭṭhakathāti imāniyeva nāmāni dissanti,
anya-e0105n:315_10: bahūsu ca ṭhānesu “saṅkhepaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahāpaccariyañca vutta”ntiādinā pārā.
anya-e0105n:315_11: aṭṭha. 1.94 dvinnampi samānavinicchayo dassito. Tasmā vajirabuddhiyaṃ cūḷapaccarīti
anya-e0105n:315_12: vuttaṭṭhakathā mahāpaccarito uddharitvā saṅkhepena kataṭṭhakathā bhaveyya, sā ca
anya-e0105n:315_13: saṅkhepena katattā saṅkhepaṭṭhakathā nāma jātā bhaveyya. Evañca sati mahāpaccariyā
anya-e0105n:315_14: sutāya sāpi sutāyeva hotīti na sā ācariyena sutāti veditabbā.
anya-e0105n:316_4: saṅghapālādayo therā taṃ visuddhimaggādiganthānaṃ karaṇatthāya visuṃ visuṃ āyāciṃsu.
anya-e0105n:316_5: Ettha ca ācariyassa yathāvuttaguṇehi sampannabhāvo attano vacaneneva pākaṭo. Vuttañhi
anya-e0105n:318_1: mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ visuddhattheravādīnaṃ desanānayasaṅkhāte sakasamaye ca mahāsaṅghikādimahāyānikapariyosānānaṃ
anya-e0105n:318_2: nikāyantarabhūtānaṃ paresaṃ piṭakaganthantaravādanayasaṅkhāte parasamaye ca tathā
anya-e0105n:318_4: tesaṃ sakasamayaparasamayānaṃ durogāhadubbodhatthasaṅkhāte gahanaṭṭhānepi ca ogāhituṃ
anya-e0105n:318_5: samatthoti dīpeti. Paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatoti padena ācariyabuddhaghosatthero porāṇaṭṭhakathāyo
anya-e0105n:320_0: Kasmā pana te taṃ āyāciṃsūti? Vuccate, mahāvihāravāsino hi āditoyeva paṭṭhāya piṭakattayaṃ
anya-e0105n:320_1: yathā tīsu saṅgītīsu pāḷibhāsāya saṅgītaṃ, yathā ca vaṭṭagāmaṇirājakāle (455-467-bu-va)
anya-e0105n:320_2: potthakesu āropitaṃ, tathā porāṇaṃ pāḷipiṭakameva uggaṇhanti ceva vācenti ca, na
anya-e0105n:320_3: sakkatāropitapiṭakaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyo ca tivassasatamattato pure katā. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0105n:320_4: vasabharājakālato (609-653-bu-0) pacchā sīhaḷikattherānañceva aññesañca vatthu na
anya-e0105n:320_5: dissati ṭhapetvā mahāsenarājavatthuṃ pārā. aṭṭha. 2.236-237, yāva ācariyabuddhaghosakālāpi
anya-e0105n:320_6: ca tā eva porāṇaṭṭhakathāyo atthi na abhinavīkatā. Tena tesaṃ piṭakesu yebhuyyena
anya-e0105n:320_7: janā paricayaṃ kātuṃ asañjātābhilāsā honti asañjātussāhā. Dīpantaresu ca attano piṭakaṃ
anya-e0105n:320_8: pattharāpetuṃ na sakkonti aṭṭhakathānaṃ dīpabhāsāya abhisaṅkhatattā. Abhayagirivāsino
anya-e0105n:320_10: mahāyānapiṭakampi navaṃ navaṃ pariyāpuṇanti ceva vācenti ca, tena tesaṃ piṭakesu
anya-e0105n:320_11: yebhuyyena janā paricayaṃ kātuṃ sañjātābhilāsā honti sañjātussāhā, navaṃ navameva
anya-e0105n:320_12: hi sattā piyāyanti. Tatoyeva te dīpantaresupi attano vādaṃ pattharāpetuṃ sakkonti.
anya-e0105n:320_13: Tasmā te mahāvihāravāsino therā attano sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo pāḷibhāsāya abhisaṅkharitukāmā
anya-e0105n:320_14: tathā kātuṃ samatthaṃ ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa ñāṇappabhāvavisesaṃ yathāvuttaguṇasampannabhāvañca
anya-e0105n:322_0: Tesu tāva visuddhimaggaṃ ācariyabuddhaghoso saṅghapālattherena ajjhesito mahāvihārassa
anya-e0105n:322_1: dakkhiṇabhāge padhānaghare mahānigamassāmino pāsāde pari. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā vasanto
anya-e0105n:322_2: akāsi. Ettāvatā ca “so panesa visuddhimaggo kena kato, kadā kato, kattha kato, kasmā
anya-e0105n:322_3: kato”ti imesaṃ pañhānamattho vitthārena vibhāvito hoti.
anya-e0105n:323: Idāni kimatthaṃ katotiādīnaṃ pañhānamatthaṃ pakāsayissāma. Tattha kimatthaṃ katoti etassa pana pañhassa attho ācariyeneva pakāsito. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0105n:330: Visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissaṃ, taṃ me sakkacca bhāsato;
anya-e0105n:332_0: Tasmā esa visuddhimaggo visuddhisaṅkhātanibbānakāmānaṃ sādhujanānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātassa
anya-e0105n:332_1: visuddhimaggassa yāthāvato jānanatthāya katoti padhānappayojanavasena veditabbo.
anya-e0105n:332_3: katoti veditabbo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ āgamaṭṭhakathāsu –
anya-e0105n:335: Icceva me kato”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā.
anya-e0105n:337: Kiṃ nissāya katoti etassapi pañhassa attho ācariyeneva pakāsito. Vuttañhi ettha ganthārambhe –
anya-e0105n:343: Sabbasaṅkaradosehi, mutto yasmā pakāsito”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā.
anya-e0105n:344_0: Iminā pana vacanena ayamattho pākaṭo hoti – “visuddhimaggaṃ kurumāno ācariyo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ
anya-e0105n:344_1: desanānayasaṅkhātā pañcannampi nikāyānaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyo nissāya tāsu vuttaṃ gahetabbaṃ
anya-e0105n:344_2: sabbaṃ vinicchayaṃ samāharitvā akāsī”ti. Tasmā yā yā ettha padavaṇṇanā vā vinicchayo
anya-e0105n:344_3: vā sādhakavatthu vā dassīyati, taṃ sabbaṃ tassa tassa niddhāritapāḷipadassanikāyasaṃvaṇṇanābhūtāya
anya-e0105n:344_4: porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathāto ānetvā bhāsāparivattanavaseneva dassitanti veditabbaṃ. Ayampi
anya-e0105n:344_5: hi visuddhimaggo na kevalaṃ attano ñāṇappabhāvena kato, visuṃ pakaraṇabhāvena ca,
anya-e0105n:344_6: atha kho catunnampi āgamaṭṭhakathānaṃ avayavabhāveneva kato. Vuttañhi tāsaṃ nigamane –
anya-e0105n:348: Suparimitaparicchinnaṃ, cattālīsasataṃ hotī”tiādi dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n:349_0: Yā pana visuddhimagge maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiniddese “ayaṃ tāva visuddhikathāyaṃ
anya-e0105n:349_1: nayo. Ariyavaṃsakathāyaṃ panā”tiādinā visuddhi. 2.717 dve kathā vuttā, tāpi mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ
anya-e0105n:349_2: desanānaye antogadhā imassa visuddhimaggassa nissayāyevāti veditabbāti.
anya-e0105n:351: Kena pakārena katoti ettha anantarapañhe vuttappakāreneva kato. Tathā hi ācariyo saṃyuttanikāyato
anya-e0105n:352: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0105n:353: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti saṃ. ni. 1.23 –
anya-e0105n:354_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetvā tattha padhānavasena vuttā sīlasamādhipaññāyo visuṃ
anya-e0105n:354_1: visuṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā akāsi. Evaṃ kurumāno ca pañcahipi nikāyehi sīlasamādhipaññāpaṭisaṃyuttāni
anya-e0105n:354_2: suttapadāni uddharitvā tesaṃ atthañca sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāhi bhāsāparivattanavasena dassetvā
anya-e0105n:354_3: tāsu vuttāni sīhaḷikavatthūni ca vinicchaye ca pakāsesi. Visesato pana tasmiṃ kāle
anya-e0105n:354_4: pākaṭā sakasamayaviruddhā samayantarā ca bahūsu ṭhānesu dassetvā sahetukaṃ paṭikkhittā. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0105n:355_0: Tattha hi cariyāvaṇṇanāyaṃ “tatra purimā tāva tisso cariyā pubbāciṇṇanidānā dhātudosanidānā
anya-e0105n:355_1: cāti ekacce vadanti. Pubbe kira iṭṭhappayogasubhakammabahulo rāgacarito hoti, saggā
anya-e0105n:355_2: vā cavitvā idhūpapanno. Pubbe chedanavadhabandhanaverakammabahulo dosacarito hoti,
anya-e0105n:355_3: nirayanāgayonīhi vā cavitvā idhūpapanno. Pubbe majjapānabahulo sutaparipucchāvihīno
anya-e0105n:355_4: ca mohacarito hoti, tiracchānayoniyā vā cavitvā idhūpapannoti evaṃ pubbāciṇṇanidānāti
anya-e0105n:355_5: vadanti. Dvinnaṃ pana dhātūnaṃ ussannattā puggalo mohacarito hoti pathavīdhātuyā
anya-e0105n:355_6: ca āpodhātuyā ca. Itarāsaṃ dvinnaṃ ussannattā dosacarito. Sabbāsaṃ samattā pana rāgacaritoti.
anya-e0105n:355_7: Dosesu ca semhādhiko rāgacarito hoti. Vātādhiko mohacarito. Semhādhiko vā mohacarito.
anya-e0105n:355_8: Vātādhiko rāgacaritoti evaṃ dhātudosanidānāti vadantī”ti ekaccevādaṃ dassetvā so
anya-e0105n:355_9: “tattha yasmā pubbe iṭṭhappayogasubhakammabahulāpi saggā cavitvā idhūpapannāpi ca
anya-e0105n:355_10: na sabbe rāgacaritāneva honti, na itare vā dosamohacaritā. Evaṃ dhātūnañca yathāvutteneva
anya-e0105n:355_11: nayena ussadaniyamo nāma natthi. Dosaniyame ca rāgamohadvayameva vuttaṃ, tampi ca
anya-e0105n:355_12: pubbāparaviruddhameva. Tasmā sabbametaṃ aparicchinnavacana”nti visuddhi. 1.44 paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0105n:355_13: Taṃ paramatthamañjūsāya nāma visuddhimaggamahāṭīkāyaṃ “ekacceti upatissattheraṃ sandhāyāha,
anya-e0105n:355_14: tena hi vimuttimagge tathā vutta”ntiādinā vaṇṇitaṃ visuddhi. ṭī. 1.44.
anya-e0105n:357: Ko so vimuttimaggo nāma? Visuddhimaggo viya sīlasamādhipaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ vibhajitvā dīpako eko paṭipattigantho. Tattha hi –
anya-e0105n:358: “Sīlaṃ samādhi paññā ca, vimutti ca anuttarā;
anya-e0105n:359: Anubuddhā ime dhammā, gotamena yasassinā”ti dī. ni. 2.186; a. ni. 4.1 –
anya-e0105n:360_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetvā tadatthavaṇṇanāvasena sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiyo visuṃ
anya-e0105n:360_1: visuṃ vibhajitvā dīpitā. So pana gantho idāni cinaraṭṭheyeva diṭṭho, cinabhāsāya
anya-e0105n:360_2: ca parivattito (1048-bu-va) saṅghapālena nāma bhikkhunā. Kena pana so kuto ca tattha
anya-e0105n:360_3: ānītoti na pākaṭametaṃ. Tassa pana saṅghapālassa ācariyo guṇabhadro nāma mahāyāniko
anya-e0105n:360_4: bhikkhu majjhimaindiyadesiko, so indiyaraṭṭhato cinaraṭṭhaṃ gacchanto paṭhamaṃ sīhaḷadīpaṃ
anya-e0105n:360_5: gantvā tato (978-bu-va) cinaraṭṭhaṃ gato. Tadā so tena ānīto bhaveyya vimuttimagga, visuddhimagga.
anya-e0105n:361_0: Tasmiñhi vimuttimagge pubbāciṇṇanidānadassanaṃ dhātunidānadassanañca yatheva visuddhimagge
anya-e0105n:361_1: ekaccevādo, tathevāgataṃ. Dosanidānadassane pana “semhādhiko rāgacarito, pittādhiko
anya-e0105n:361_2: dosacarito, vātādhiko mohacarito. Semhādhiko vā mohacarito, vātādhiko rāgacarito”ti
anya-e0105n:361_3: tiṇṇampi rāgadosamohānaṃ dosaniyamo vutto. Ācariyabuddhaghosena diṭṭhavimuttimaggapotthake
anya-e0105n:362: Aññānipi bahūni visuddhimagge paṭikkhittāni tattha vimuttimagge gahetabbabhāvena dissanti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0105n:363: Sīlaniddese (1, 8-piṭṭhe) “aññe pana siraṭṭho sīlattho, sītalattho sīlatthoti evamādināpi nayenettha atthaṃ vaṇṇayantī”ti paṭikkhitto atthopi tattha gahetabbabhāvena dissati.
anya-e0105n:364_1: atthato dhutaṅgameva natthi, asantaṃ kassa dhunanato dhutaṅgaṃ nāma bhavissati, dhutaguṇe
anya-e0105n:364_2: samādāya vattatīti vacanavirodhopi ca nesaṃ āpajjati, tasmā taṃ na gahetabba”nti
anya-e0105n:364_3: paṭikkhittaṃ paññattidhutaṅgampi tattha dissati. Mahāṭīkāyaṃ (1-104) pana “yesanti
anya-e0105n:364_4: abhayagirivāsike sandhāyāha, te hi dhutaṅgaṃ nāma paññattīti vadantī”ti vaṇṇitaṃ.
anya-e0105n:365_1: upekkhānubrūhanā nāma appanā, sampahaṃsanā nāma paccavekkhaṇāti evameke vaṇṇayantī”tiādinā
anya-e0105n:365_2: paṭikkhittaekevādopi tattha dissati. Mahāṭīkāyaṃ (1, 172) pana “eketi abhayagirivāsino”ti vaṇṇitaṃ.
anya-e0105n:366_1: ekaccānaṃ matena middharūpa”nti evaṃ aññānipi rūpāni āharitvā porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0105n:366_2: tesaṃ paṭikkhittabhāvo pakāsito. Mahāṭīkāyaṃ “ekaccānanti abhayagirivāsīna”nti vaṇṇitaṃ.
anya-e0105n:366_3: Tesu jātirūpaṃ middharūpañca vimuttimagge dassitaṃ. Na kevalaṃ dassanamattameva,
anya-e0105n:366_4: atha kho middharūpassa atthibhāvopi “middhaṃ nāma tividhaṃ āhārajaṃ utujaṃ cittajañcāti.
anya-e0105n:366_5: Tesu cittajameva nīvaraṇaṃ hoti, sesā pana dve arahatopi bhaveyyu”ntiādinā sādhito.
anya-e0105n:367_0: Ettāvatā ca vimuttimagge visuddhimaggena asamānatthānaṃ vuttabhāvo ca abhayagirivāsīhi
anya-e0105n:367_1: tassa ganthassa paṭiggahitabhāvo ca sakkā ñātuṃ. Aññānipi pana īdisāni asamānavacanāni
anya-e0105n:367_2: bahūni tattha saṃvijjantiyeva, tāni pana sabbāni na sakkā idha dassetuṃ.
anya-e0105n:368_0: Yebhuyyena panassa karaṇappakāro visuddhimaggassa viya hoti. Yā yā hi pāḷi abhidhammavibhaṅgato
anya-e0105n:368_1: vā paṭisambhidāmaggato vā aññasuttantehi vā ānetvā sādhakabhāvena visuddhimagge dassiyati,
anya-e0105n:368_2: tatthapi sā sā pāḷi yebhuyyena dissateva. Tāsu kañcimattaṃ uddharitvā anuminanatthāya dassayissāma.
anya-e0105n:369: Yā visuddhimagge (1, 47-piṭṭhe) “pañca sīlāni pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ sīla”ntiādikā paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷi dassitā, sā vimuttimaggepi dissateva.
anya-e0105n:370_1: vicikicchāyā”ti vacanaṃ peṭake vuttanti dassitaṃ, tañca tatthapi tatheva dassetvā
anya-e0105n:370_2: “tipeṭake vutta”nti niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tipeṭaketi nāmañca peṭakopadesameva sandhāya vuttaṃ
anya-e0105n:370_3: bhaveyya. Tattha hi vivicceva kāmehīti pāṭhasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “alobhassa pāripūriyā kāmehi
anya-e0105n:370_4: viveko sampajjati, adosassa. Amohassa pāripūriyā akusalehi dhammehi viveko sampajjatī”ti
anya-e0105n:370_5: pāṭhassa tipeṭake vuttabhāvo dassito. So ca pāṭho peṭakopadese (262-piṭṭhe) “tattha
anya-e0105n:370_6: alobhassa pāripūriyā vivitto hoti kāmehī”tiādinā dissati.
anya-e0105n:371: Yathā ca visuddhimagge (1, 258-piṭṭhe) “ayampi kho bhikkhave ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvito”tiādikā pāḷi mahāvaggasaṃyuttakato ānetvā dassitā, tatheva tatthapi.
anya-e0105n:372_1: pāḷi ca (1, 273-piṭṭhe) kakacūpamapāḷi ca paṭisambhidāmaggato ānetvā dassitā, tatheva tatthapi.
anya-e0105n:373_0: Yathā ca visuddhimagge (2, 69-piṭṭhe) “katamā cintāmayā paññā”tiādikā ca pāḷi “tattha
anya-e0105n:373_1: katamaṃ āyakosalla”ntiādikā ca pāḷi (2, 71-piṭṭhe) “dukkhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”tiādikā
anya-e0105n:373_2: ca pāḷi abhidhammavibhaṅgato ānetvā dassitā, tatheva tatthapi. Sabbāpi ca tattha
anya-e0105n:373_3: vuttā ekavidhaduvidhādipaññāpabhedakathā visuddhimagge vuttakathāya yebhuyyena samānāyeva.
anya-e0105n:375: Parittaṃ sukhumaṃ etaṃ, ūkāsirasamūpama”nti visuddhi. 2.436; dha. sa. aṭṭha. 596 –
anya-e0105n:376_0: Ayampi gāthā vimuttimaggepi āyasmatā sāriputtattherena bhāsitabhāveneva dassitā.
anya-e0105n:376_1: Ūkāsirasamūpamanti padaṃ pana ūkāsamūpamanti tattha dissati, tañca paramparalekhakānaṃ
anya-e0105n:377_0: Catūsu saccesu visuddhimagge viya vacanatthato lakkhaṇato anūnādhikato kamato antogadhānaṃ
anya-e0105n:377_1: pabhedato upamāto ca vinicchayo dassito, so ca yebhuyyena visuddhimaggena visuddhi. 2.530 samānoyeva.
anya-e0105n:378_0: Yathā ca visuddhimagge (2, 242-245) sammasanañāṇakathāyaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ atītādiekādasavidhena
anya-e0105n:378_1: ca aniccādilakkhaṇattayena ca visuṃ visuṃ sammasananayo dassito, tatheva tatthapi.
anya-e0105n:378_2: Cakkhādijarāmaraṇapariyosānesu pana dhammesu dhammavicārapariyosānānaṃ saṭṭhiyā eva
anya-e0105n:379_1: ubho bhijjanti paccayā”ti gāthā ca, “na cakkhuto jāyare”tiādikā cha gāthāyo ca, “na
anya-e0105n:379_2: sakena balena jāyare”tiādikā cha gāthāyo ca vimuttimagge bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇakathāyaṃ
anya-e0105n:380: Visuddhimagge (2, 261-2-piṭṭhesu) arūpasattakesu ariyavaṃsakathānayena vutto kalāpato ca yamakato ca sammasananayo vimuttimagge ettheva bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇakathāyaṃ dassito.
anya-e0105n:381: Vimuttimagge buddhānussatikathāyaṃ lokavidūti padassa atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ sattalokasaṅkhāralokavasena dveyeva lokā dassitā, na pana okāsaloko yathā visuddhimagge (1, 199-200-piṭṭhesu).
anya-e0105n:382_0: Ettāvatā ca vimuttimaggo nāma gantho kīdisoti sakkā anuminituṃ. So pana yathā na
anya-e0105n:382_1: mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ gantho hoti, evaṃ mahāyānikānampi na hotiyeva theravādapiṭakameva
anya-e0105n:382_2: nissāya katabhāvato. Yasmā pana tattha na kiñcipi sīhaḷadīpikaṃ nāmaṃ vā theravādo
anya-e0105n:382_3: vā dissati, tasmā so sīhaḷadīpe kataganthopi na hoti. Indiyaraṭṭhikaṃ pana nāmañca
anya-e0105n:382_4: vohāro ca tattha bahūsu ṭhānesu dissati, tasmā indiyaraṭṭhe kataganthova bhaveyya.
anya-e0105n:382_5: Yasmā cassa peṭakopadesaṃ nissitabhāvo bahūsu ṭhānesu dissati, visesato pana middharūpassa
anya-e0105n:382_6: atthibhāvo ca, arahatopi tassa atthibhāvo ca tameva nissāya dassīyati, paṭisambhidāmaggagaṇṭhipade
anya-e0105n:382_7: ca peṭaketi padassa paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 1.1.36 atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ “suttantapiṭakatthāya
anya-e0105n:382_8: aṭṭhakathā peṭakaṃ mahisāsakānaṃ gantho”ti vaṇṇito. Tasmā eso vimuttimaggo mahisāsakanikāyikena
anya-e0105n:384_0: Visuddhimaggo pana na kevalaṃ pubbe vuttappakāreneva kato, atha kho vuccamānappakārenāpi.
anya-e0105n:384_1: Tathā hi ācariyabuddhaghosatthero porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi samāharitvā bhāsāparivattanavasena
anya-e0105n:384_2: dassentopi yā yā atthavaṇṇanā vā vinicchayo vā saṃsayitabbo hoti, tattha tattha vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0105n:384_3: vuttanti vā (1, 263), vinayaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ, majjhimaṭṭhakathāsu panāti vā (1,
anya-e0105n:384_5: vā (1, 99), vuttampi cetaṃ aṭṭhakathāsūti vā (1, 118), taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittanti
anya-e0105n:384_6: vā (1, 134), dīghabhāṇakasaṃyuttabhāṇakānaṃ matanti vā, majjhimabhāṇakā icchantīti
anya-e0105n:384_7: vā (1, 267), aṭṭhakathāsu vinicchayoti vā, evaṃ tāva dīghabhāṇakā, majjhimabhāṇakā
anya-e0105n:384_8: panāhūti vā (1, 277), aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana…pe… ayaṃ kamo vutto, so pāḷiyā na
anya-e0105n:384_9: sametīti vā (1, 309), evaṃ tāva majjhimabhāṇakā, saṃyuttabhāṇakā panāti vā (2, 62),
anya-e0105n:384_10: saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti vā (2, 63), aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panāti vā (2, 80) evaṃ taṃtaṃatthavaṇṇanāvinicchayānaṃ
anya-e0105n:384_11: nissayampi vibhāvetvā pacchimajanānaṃ uppajjamānasaṃsayaṃ vinodentoyeva te dassesi.
anya-e0105n:385_0: Tenimassa visuddhimaggassa karaṇakāle sabbāpi sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo ācariyassa santike
anya-e0105n:385_1: santīti ca, pubbeyeva tā ācariyena sīhaḷattherānaṃ santike sutāti ca, tāhi gahetabbaṃ
anya-e0105n:385_2: sabbaṃ gahetvā ayaṃ visuddhimaggo ācariyena likhitoti ca ayamattho ativiya pākaṭo
anya-e0105n:386_1: kiñcipi aññaṃ potthakaṃ anoloketvā ācariyabuddhaghoso visuddhimaggaṃ akāsī”ti adhippāyena
anya-e0105n:388_0: Na kevalaṃ ācariyo aṭṭhakathāyoyeva nissayabhāvena dassesi, atha kho “porāṇā panāhū”tiādinā
anya-e0105n:388_1: porāṇānaṃ vacanampi dassesiyeva. Tadettha dvāvīsatiyā ṭhānesu diṭṭhaṃ visuddhi. 1.15,
anya-e0105n:388_3: Ke panete porāṇā nāma? Yāva catutthasaṅgītikālā saṅgītikāresu pariyāpannā vā tādisā
anya-e0105n:388_4: vā mahātherāti veditabbā. Tathā hi paṭisambhidāmagge (292-3-piṭṭhesu).
anya-e0105n:389: “Obhāse ceva ñāṇe ca, pītiyā ca vikampati…pe…
anya-e0105n:390: Dhammuddhaccakusalo hoti, na ca vikkhepaṃ gacchatī”ti –
anya-e0105n:391_0: Evamāgatā gāthāyo idha (273-4-piṭṭhesu) porāṇānaṃ vacanabhāvena dassitā. Yadi cimā
anya-e0105n:391_1: gāthāyo saṅgītikārehi pakkhittā bhaveyyuṃ yathā parivārapāḷiyaṃ (3-piṭṭhe) āgatā
anya-e0105n:391_2: ācariyaparamparādīpikā gāthāyo, tā hi samantapāsādikāyaṃ (1, 46-piṭṭhe) porāṇavacanabhāvena
anya-e0105n:391_3: dassitā, evaṃ sati teyeva saṅgītikārā porāṇāti veditabbā. Atha paṭisambhidāmaggadesakeneva
anya-e0105n:391_4: bhāsitā bhaveyyuṃ, te viya garukaraṇīyā paccayikā saddhāyitabbakā mahātherā porāṇāti
anya-e0105n:393_0: Ācariyo pana imaṃ visuddhimaggapakaraṇaṃ yathāvuttappakārena katvā aññāpi tipiṭakaṭṭhakathāyo
anya-e0105n:393_1: anukkamena akāsi. Kathaṃ? Samantapāsādikaṃ nāma vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ buddhasirittherena
anya-e0105n:393_2: ajjhesito mahāvihārassa dakkhiṇabhāge padhānagharapariveṇe mahānigamassāmino pāsāde
anya-e0105n:393_3: vasanto akāsi. Sā panesā siripāloti nāmantarassa mahānāmarañño vīsatimavasse (973-bu-va)
anya-e0105n:393_4: āraddhā ekavīsatimavasse (974-bu-va) niṭṭhānappattā ahosi. Tañca pana karonto mahāmahindattherenābhataṃ
anya-e0105n:393_5: sīhaḷabhāsāya saṅkhataṃ mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ tassā sarīraṃ katvā mahāpaccarīkurundīsaṅkhepaandhakaṭṭhakathāhi
anya-e0105n:393_6: ca gahetabbaṃ gahetvā sīhaḷadīpe yāva vasabharājakālā pākaṭānaṃ porāṇa vinayadharamahātherānaṃ
anya-e0105n:393_7: vinicchayabhūtaṃ theravādampi pakkhipitvā akāsi. Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ –
anya-e0105n:396: Vinicchayo aṭṭhakathāsu vutto, yo yuttamatthaṃ apariccajanto;
anya-e0105n:397: Tatopi antogadhatheravādaṃ, saṃvaṇṇanaṃ samma samārabhissa”nti ca.
anya-e0105n:411: Rañño sirinivāsassa siriyā nivāsaṭṭhonabhūtassa siripālanāmakassa rañño (vimati, antimaviṭṭhe), siripālayasassino.
anya-e0105n:415: Ekasaṃvacchareneva, yathā niṭṭhaṃ upāgatā”ti pari. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:416_3: (724) visuddhimaggopi antamaso chappañcamāsehi niṭṭhāpito bhaveyyāti sakkā ñātuṃ.
anya-e0105n:416_4: Tasmā yaṃ buddhaghosuppattiyaṃ mahāvaṃsavacanaṃ nissāya “visuddhimaggo ācariyabuddhaghosena
anya-e0105n:416_5: ekaratteneva tikkhattuṃ likhitvā niṭṭhāpito”ti abhitthutivacanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ takkārakassa
anya-e0105n:417_0: Nanu ca imissaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sumaṅgalavilāsiniya”ntiādinā visesanāmavasena āgamaṭṭhakathānaṃ
anya-e0105n:417_1: atideso dissati pārā. aṭṭha. 1.15, kathamimissā tāhi paṭhamataraṃ katabhāvo veditabboti?
anya-e0105n:417_3: mahāvihāravāsīhi visesena garukatabhāvato, saṅgītikkamānurūpabhāvato, idheva paripuṇṇanidānakathāpakāsanato,
anya-e0105n:417_4: nigamane ca paṭhamaṃ sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo sutvā karaṇappakāsanato ṭhapetvā visuddhimaggaṃ
anya-e0105n:417_5: ayameva paṭhamaṃ katāti veditabbā. Visuddhimagge pana vinayaṭṭhakathāyanti vā vinayaṭṭhakathāsūti
anya-e0105n:417_6: vā majjhimaṭṭhakathāsūti vā evaṃ sāmaññanāmavaseneva atideso dissati, na samantapāsādikādivisesanāmavasena.
anya-e0105n:417_7: Tasmāssa sabbapaṭhamaṃ katabhāvo pākaṭoyeva. Āgamaṭṭhakathānaṃ idhātideso pārā. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n:417_8: 1.15 imissāpi tatthāti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.8 evaṃ aññamaññātideso pana ācariyassa manasā
anya-e0105n:417_9: suvavatthitavasena vā sakkā bhavituṃ, apubbācarimapariniṭṭhāpanena vā. Kathaṃ? Ācariyena
anya-e0105n:417_10: hi visuddhimaggaṃ sabbaso niṭṭhāpetvā samantapāsādikādiṃ ekekamaṭṭhakathaṃ karonteneva
anya-e0105n:417_11: yattha yattha atthavaṇṇanā vitthārato aññaṭṭhakathāsu pakāsetabbā hoti, tattha tattha
anya-e0105n:417_12: “imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne kathessāmī”ti manasā suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā tañca atidisitvā
anya-e0105n:417_13: yathāvavatthitaṭhānappattakāle taṃ vitthārato kathentena tā katā vā bhaveyyuṃ. Ekekissāya
anya-e0105n:417_14: vā niṭṭhānāsannappattakāle taṃ ṭhapetvā aññañca aññañca tathā katvā sabbāpi apubbācarimaṃ
anya-e0105n:417_15: pariniṭṭhāpitā bhaveyyunti evaṃ dvinnaṃ pakārānamaññataravasena ācariyassāṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0105n:419: Sumaṅgalavilāsiniṃ nāma dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathaṃ pana ācariyo sumaṅgalapariveṇavāsinā dāṭhānāgattherena āyācito akāsi. Vuttaṃ hetametissā nigamane –
anya-e0105n:424: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3. nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n:425: Papañcasūdaniṃ nāma majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathaṃ bhadantabuddhamittattherena pubbe mayūradūtapaṭṭane attanā saddhiṃ vasantena āyācito akāsi. Vuttaṃ hetametissā nigamane –
anya-e0105n:430: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā”ti ma. ni. aṭṭha. 3. nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n:431: Sāratthappakāsiniṃ nāma saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathaṃ bhadantajotipālattherena āyācito akāsi. Vuttaṃ hetametissā nigamane –
anya-e0105n:435: Yaṃ samadhigataṃ puññaṃ, tenāpi jano sukhī bhavatū”ti saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.5.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n:436_1: kañcipurādīsu ca sīhaḷadīpe mahāvihāramhi ca attanā saddhiṃ vasantena āyācito, tathā
anya-e0105n:436_2: jīvakenāpi upāsakena piṭakattayapāragubhūtena vātāhatepi aniñjamānasabhāve dume viya
anya-e0105n:436_3: aniñjamānasaddhamme ṭhitena sumatinā parisuddhājīvenābhiyācito akāsi. Vuttaṃ hetametissā nigamane –
anya-e0105n:447: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā;
anya-e0105n:449: Sabbāgamasaṃvaṇṇana, manoratho pūrito ca me yasmā;
anya-e0105n:450: Etāya manoratha pūraṇīti nāmaṃ tato assā”ti a. ni. aṭṭha. 3.11.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n:451_0: Imā ca pana catasso āgamaṭṭhakathāyo kurumāno ācariyabuddhaghoso mahāmahindattherenābhataṃ
anya-e0105n:458: “Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā ca;
anya-e0105n:459: “Mūlaṭṭhakathāsāraṃ, ādāya mayā imaṃ karontenā”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:460_0: Imāsaṃ sarīrabhūtapāṭhesu ca samantapāsādikāyaṃ viya “mahāpaccariyaṃ, kurundiya”ntiādinā
anya-e0105n:460_1: vinicchayasaṃvaṇṇanābhedappakāsanaṃ na dissati, tathā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsupi. Tenetaṃ
anya-e0105n:460_2: ñāyati “suttantābhidhammesu mahāaṭṭhakathāto aññā mahāpaccariādināmikā porāṇikā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo
anya-e0105n:460_3: ceva andhakaṭṭhakathā ca natthī”ti. Yāva vasabharājakālā (609-653) pana pākaṭānaṃ
anya-e0105n:460_4: sīhaḷikattherānaṃ vinicchayo ca vādā ca vatthūni ca etāsupi dissantiyevāti.
anya-e0105n:462_1: tisso abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyo attanā sadisanāmena sotatthakīganthakārakena buddhaghosabhikkhunā
anya-e0105n:464: Bhikkhunā buddhaghosena, sakkaccaṃ abhiyācito”ti dha. sa. aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:466: Ayaṃ aṭṭhasālinī nāma dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathā”ti dha. sa. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:469: Yaṃ ārabhiṃ racayituṃ, aṭṭhakathaṃ sunipuṇesu atthesu;
anya-e0105n:470: Sammohavinodanato, sammohavinodaniṃ nāmā”ti vibha. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:472: Ayaṃ sammohavinodanī nāma vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathā”ti vibha. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:473_0: Imāsu pana tīsu pañcapakaraṇaṭṭhakathāya nāmaviseso natthi āyācako ca na pakāsito,
anya-e0105n:473_1: kevalaṃ attano saddhāya eva sañcoditena ācariyabuddhaghosena sā katā viya dissati.
anya-e0105n:477: Saddhāya samāraddhā, yā aṭṭhakathā mayā tassāti ca.
anya-e0105n:481: Tassa aṭṭhakathā esā, sakalassāpi niṭṭhitā”ti paṭṭhā. aṭṭha. 19-24.1 ca.
anya-e0105n:483: Ayaṃ sakalassapi abhidhammapiṭakassa aṭṭhakathā”ti paṭṭhā. aṭṭha. 19-24.1 ca.
anya-e0105n:484_0: Ekacce pana ādhunikā therā “abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyo ācariyabuddhaghosena yācito saṅghapālabuddhamittajotipālādīnaṃ
anya-e0105n:484_1: aññataro thero akāsī”ti vadanti. Ayañca nesaṃ vicāraṇā, aṭṭhasālinīsammohavinodanīsu
anya-e0105n:484_2: “tā buddhaghosena yācito akāsī”ti ganthakārena vuttaṃ. Tena ñāyati “takkārako añño,
anya-e0105n:484_3: ācariyabuddhaghoso pana tāsu yācakapuggaloyevā”ti. Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu ca ācariyabuddhaghosena –
anya-e0105n:486: Iti pana sabbaṃ yasmā, visuddhimagge mayā suparisuddhaṃ;
anya-e0105n:487: Vuttaṃ tasmā bhiyyo, na taṃ idha vicārayissāmī”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā –
anya-e0105n:488: Evaṃ sīlakathādīnaṃ attanā eva visuddhimagge vuttabhāvo mayātipadena pakāsito. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana –
anya-e0105n:490: Visuddhimagge panidaṃ, yasmā sabbaṃ pakāsita”nti dha. sa. aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā –
anya-e0105n:491_0: Evaṃ mayāti kattupadena vinā vuttaṃ. Tenāpi ñāyati “visuddhimaggakārako añño, abhidhammaṭṭhakathākārako
anya-e0105n:491_1: añño”ti. Kiñcāpi abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu abhiyācako buddhaghoso bhikkhunāti ca yatināti
anya-e0105n:491_2: ca imeheva sāmaññaguṇapadehi vutto na therenāti sagāravaguṇapadena, tathāpi so “visuddhācārasīlena
anya-e0105n:491_3: nipuṇāmalabuddhinā”ti ca, “adandhagatinā subuddhinā”ti ca imehi adhikaguṇapadehi
anya-e0105n:491_4: thomitattā “visuddhimaggādikārako ācariyabuddhaghosoyevā”ti sakkā gahetuṃ. So hi
anya-e0105n:491_6: kāle ūnadasavasso bhaveyya, tasmā therenāti na vuttoti sakkā gahetunti.
anya-e0105n:492_0: Taṃ pana tesaṃ ativicāraṇamattameva. Na hi ācariyabuddhaghosatthero “tasmiṃ kāle
anya-e0105n:492_1: ūnadasavasso”ti sakkā gahetuṃ, visuddhimagganigamanepi “buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena
anya-e0105n:492_2: therenā”ti vacanato, na ca “visuddhācārasīlena, nipuṇāmalabuddhinā”ti vā, “adandhagatinā
anya-e0105n:492_3: subuddhinā”ti vā ettakeheva dvīhi dvīhi guṇapadehi thomanena suthomito hoti, aññadatthu
anya-e0105n:492_4: “nippabhīkatakhajjoto samudeti divākaro”ti thomanaṃ viya hoti. Nanu ācariyena attano ganthanigamanesu –
anya-e0105n:494_0: Attano anucchavikāni guṇapadāni pakāsitāni, soyeva ca porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo saṅkhipitvā
anya-e0105n:494_1: abhinavasaṅgahaṭṭhakathānaṃ ādikattā pubbaṅgamo, aññe pana abhinavaṭṭhakathākārā
anya-e0105n:494_2: tasseva anuvattitvā avasesamekaṃ vā dve vā aṭṭhakathāyo akaṃsu. Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0105n:494_3: ca yo yo attho visuddhimagge vutto, so so yathānuppattaṭṭhāne tato gahetvā tatheva
anya-e0105n:494_5: jhānakathāvaṇṇanāsu ca ayamattho ativiya pākaṭo, yopi ca tattha appako katipayamatto
anya-e0105n:494_6: visuddhimaggena visadiso saṃvaṇṇanābhedo dissati, sopi ābhidhammikānaṃ matānusārena
anya-e0105n:494_7: yathā porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto, tatheva vuttoti veditabbo. Yathā ca aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ
anya-e0105n:494_8: samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya atideso dissati dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1 akusalakammapathakathā,
anya-e0105n:494_9: tatheva samantapāsādikāyampi aṭṭhasāliniyā atideso dissateva pārā. aṭṭha. 1.11;.
anya-e0105n:494_10: Yadi ca aṭṭhasālinī aññena katā bhaveyya, kathaṃ tāsu aññamaññātideso sakkā kātuṃ.
anya-e0105n:494_11: Tasmā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu abhiyācako buddhaghoso ācariyena samānanāmo cūḷabuddhaghosoti
anya-e0105n:494_12: yāvajjatanā ācariyaparamparāya gahito sotatthakīganthakārako aññoyeva, na ācariyamahābuddhaghosatthero.
anya-e0105n:495_0: Yadi pana ettakena niṭṭhaṃ na gaccheyya, evampi vicāretabbaṃ – kinnu kho saṅghapālādayo
anya-e0105n:495_1: therā visuddhimaggādīnaṃ karaṇatthāya ācariyabuddhaghosattheraṃ āyācamānā attanā
anya-e0105n:495_2: samatthataroti saddahantā āyācanti udāhu asaddahantāti? Saddahantāyeva āyācantīti
anya-e0105n:495_3: pākaṭoyevāyamattho. Tathā ca sati ācariyabuddhaghosatthero sayaṃ aññehi samatthatarova
anya-e0105n:495_4: samāno kasmā aññaṃ āyāceyya. Na hi saddhāsampannassa thāmasampannassa yobbanasampannassa
anya-e0105n:495_5: ācariyassa sundarataraṃ abhidhammaṭṭhakathaṃ kātuṃ bhāriyaṃ bhavissati. Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0105n:495_7: honti. Yadi ca abhidhammaṭṭhakathaṃ añño kareyya, kathamapi tāhi vacanākārassa visadisatā
anya-e0105n:495_8: bhaveyya eva. Etāsaṃ nigamane ca dassitena “buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena
anya-e0105n:495_9: therena katā”ti vacanena “ācariyabuddhaghosena katā”tveva pākaṭā honti, na aññenāti.
anya-e0105n:495_10: Yepi “aññena katā”ti vadanti, tepi “iminā nāma therenā”ti ekaṃsato dassetuṃ na sakkonti,
anya-e0105n:495_11: tathā dassetuñca lesamattampi sādhakavacanaṃ na dissati. Tasmā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyopi
anya-e0105n:495_12: idāni ācariyehi cūḷabuddhaghosoti voharitena buddhaghosena nāma bhikkhunāyācito visuddhimaggavinayāgamaṭṭhakathānaṃ
anya-e0105n:496: Yaṃ pana mahāvaṃse “ācariyabuddhaghoso sīhaḷadīpāgamanato pubbe jambudīpe vasanakāleyeva aṭṭhasāliniṃ akāsī”ti adhippāyena –
anya-e0105n:498_0: Vuttaṃ, taṃ idāni dissamānāya aṭṭhasāliniyā na sameti. Tattha hi ganthārambheyeva
anya-e0105n:498_1: visuddhimaggaṃ atidisitvā pacchāpi so ca, samantapāsādikā ca bahūsu ṭhānesu atidisīyanti.
anya-e0105n:498_2: Tasmā tassā ācariyena sīhaḷadīpaṃ patvā visuddhimaggañceva samantapāsādikañca katvā
anya-e0105n:500_0: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇiṃ nāma pātimokkhaṭṭhakathaṃ ācariyabuddhaghosatthero soṇattherena yācito
anya-e0105n:500_2: padaṃ pāḷiyā vā mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi vā avirodhetvā akāsi. Tena vuttaṃ
anya-e0105n:506: Vattayissāmi nāmena, kaṅkhāvitaraṇiṃ subha”nti kaṅkhā aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:509: Nissāya sā ayaṃ niṭṭhaṃ, gatā ādāya sabbaso;
anya-e0105n:511: Na hettha taṃ padaṃ atthi, yaṃ virujjheyya pāḷiyā;
anya-e0105n:512: Mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ, porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi vā”ti kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:514_0: Aparāpi tisso aṭṭhakathāyo santi khuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathā dhammapadaṭṭhakathā suttanipātaṭṭhakathā
anya-e0105n:514_1: cāti, yā tāsu dissamānanigamanavasena ācariyabuddhaghoseneva katāti paññāyanti. Tattha
anya-e0105n:514_2: pana vuttavacanāni kānici kānici āgamaṭṭhakathāsu vuttākārena na honti. Tasmā eke
anya-e0105n:514_4: paṭhamaṃ katā, pacchā ācariyena osānasodhanavasena pariyosāpitā vā bhaveyyuṃ, abhidhammaṭṭhakathaṃ
anya-e0105n:514_5: āyācantena cūḷabuddhaghosena vā katā bhaveyyu”nti vadanti.
anya-e0105n:515_0: Taṃ tathā vā hotu aññathā vā, idāni ekantato vinicchinituṃ na sukarameva. Tasmā tāsaṃ
anya-e0105n:515_1: nigamanavacanavaseneva ettha pakāsayissāma. Tāsu hi dhammapadaṭṭhakathaṃ kumārakassapattherena
anya-e0105n:515_2: āyācito sirikūṭassa (sirikuḍḍassa) rañño pāsāde viharanto paramparābhataṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya
anya-e0105n:515_3: saṇṭhitaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathaṃ pāḷibhāsāya āropetvā vitthāragatañca vacanakkamaṃ samāsetvā
anya-e0105n:515_4: gāthāsu asaṃvaṇṇitapadabyañjanāni saṃvaṇṇetvā akāsi. Vuttañhi tattha ganthārambhe –
anya-e0105n:522: Gāthānaṃ byañjanapadaṃ, yaṃ tattha na vibhāvitaṃ;
anya-e0105n:523: Kevalaṃ taṃ vibhāvetvā, sesaṃ tameva atthato.
anya-e0105n:527: Pāsāde sirikūṭassa, rañño viharatā mayā”ti dha. pa. aṭṭha. 2.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n:528_0: Ettha ca sirikūṭo nāma samantapāsādikānigamane siripāloti vutto mahānāmoyeva rājāti
anya-e0105n:528_1: vadanti. Evaṃ sati mahesiyā ānayanaṃ samādāpanamārabbha tena raññā dinne dhūmarakkhapabbatavihāre
anya-e0105n:528_2: vasantena sā katāti veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ mahāvaṃse –
anya-e0105n:535_0: Tassa pana rañño kāle sā niṭṭhāpitāti na sakkā gahetuṃ. Tassa hi rañño ekavīsatimavasse
anya-e0105n:535_1: samantapāsādikaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. So ca rājā dvāvīsatimavasse divaṅgato. Etthantare sādhikaekavassena
anya-e0105n:535_2: “catasso ca āgamaṭṭhakathāyo tisso ca abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyo ayañca dhammapadaṭṭhakathā”ti
anya-e0105n:537: Paramatthajotikaṃ nāma khuddakapāṭhassa ceva suttanipātassa ca aṭṭhakathaṃ kenacipi anāyācito attano icchāvaseneva akāsi. Vuttañhetaṃ khuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathāya ganthārambhe –
anya-e0105n:543: Tatheva ca ṭhitaṃ yasmā, navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ.
anya-e0105n:548_0: Bahū pana vicakkhaṇā imā ārambhagāthāyo vicinitvā “netaṃ ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa
anya-e0105n:548_1: viya vacanaṃ hotī”ti vadanti. Ayañca nesaṃ vicinanākāro, ācariyabuddhaghoso hi yaṃ
anya-e0105n:548_2: kañci ganthaṃ sīlādiguṇasampannena aññena āyācitova karoti, idha pana kocipi āyācako
anya-e0105n:548_4: ca “mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vācanāmaggaṃ nissāya karissāmī”ti ca evaṃ paṭiññaṃ katvāva
anya-e0105n:548_5: karoti, idha pana tādisīpi paṭiññā natthi. Punapi ācariyo atigambhīratthānaṃ catunnañcāgamānaṃ
anya-e0105n:548_6: abhidhammassa ca saṃvaṇṇanārambhepi dukkarabhāvaṃ na katheti, idha pana “sāsanaṃ
anya-e0105n:548_7: abodhantena mādisenā”ti attanā sāsanassa abuddhabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā “atidukkarā”ti ca
anya-e0105n:548_8: katheti. Tasmā “netaṃ ācariyabuddhaghosassa viya vacana”nti vadanti. Taṃ yuttaṃ viya
anya-e0105n:548_9: dissati, ācariyo hi attano ganthanigamanesu “tipiṭakapariyattippabhede sāṭṭhakathe
anya-e0105n:548_10: satthusāsane appaṭihatañāṇappabhāvenā”ti attano ñāṇappabhāvaṃ pakāsesi, so “sāsanaṃ
anya-e0105n:548_11: abodhantena mādisena atidukkarā”ti īdisaṃ vacanaṃ na katheyyayevāti.
anya-e0105n:550_0: Jātakaṭṭhakathāpi ca ācariyabuddhaghosatthereneva katāti vadanti, kāraṇaṃ panettha
anya-e0105n:550_1: na dissati. Sā pana atthadassittherena ca buddhamittattherena ca mahisāsakanikāyikena
anya-e0105n:550_2: ca buddhadevattherenāti tīhi therehi abhiyācito mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vācanāmaggaṃ nissāya
anya-e0105n:550_3: katā. Imissāpi nāmaviseso natthi. Vuttaṃ himissā ārambhe –
anya-e0105n:560: Bhāsissaṃ bhāsato taṃ me, sādhu gaṇhantu sādhavo”ti.
anya-e0105n:561: Ettāvatā ca ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa ganthabhāvena pākaṭāhi sabbaṭṭhakathāhi saha visuddhimaggassa karaṇappakāro vitthārena vibhāvito hoti.
anya-e0105n:563_5: evamādīhi anekasatehi guṇehi esa sakalaloke patthaṭo jāto.
anya-e0105n:564_0: Ayañhi visuddhimaggo saṅgītittayārūḷhaparisuddhapāḷipiṭakameva nissāya pavatto, na
anya-e0105n:564_1: mahāsaṅghikādīnaṃ sattarasannaṃ nikāyānaṃ piṭakaṃ, napi mahāyānikānaṃ piṭakaṃ. Saparivāraṃ
anya-e0105n:564_2: sikkhattayañca ettha paripuṇṇameva saṅgahetvā dassitaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ ācariyena āgamaṭṭhakathāsu ganthārambhe –
anya-e0105n:571: Iti pana sabbaṃ yasmā, visuddhimagge mayā suparisuddhaṃ;
anya-e0105n:572: Vuttaṃ tasmā bhiyyo, na taṃ idha vicārayissāmī”ti.
anya-e0105n:573_0: Yasmā pana visuddhimaggo catunnaṃ āgamaṭṭhakathānaṃ avayavabhāvena kato, tasmā tā
anya-e0105n:573_2: saṃkhipanavasena ca parasamayavivajjanavasena ca mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ parisuddhavinicchayasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0105n:573_3: sakasamayassa dīpanavasena ca kato. Vuttañhetaṃ ācariyena –
anya-e0105n:578: Hitvā punappunāgata-matthaṃ atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:581: Icceva kato tasmā, tampi gahetvāna saddhimetāya;
anya-e0105n:582: Aṭṭhakathāya vijānatha, dīghāgamanissitaṃ attha”nti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:588: Suparimitaparicchinnaṃ, cattālīsaṃ sataṃ hotī”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:589_0: Yadi cāyaṃ visuddhimaggo ācariyena āgamaṭṭhakathāyo viya akatvā porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo
anya-e0105n:589_1: ca anoloketvā kevalaṃ attano ñāṇappabhāveneva kato assa, nāyaṃ āgamaṭṭhakathānaṃ
anya-e0105n:589_2: avayavoti gahetabbo assa, aññadatthu “āgamaṭṭhakathāyo mahāṭṭhakathāya sārabhūtā,
anya-e0105n:589_3: visuddhimaggo pana na tassā sārabhūto, kevalaṃ ācariyassa matiyāva kato”ti evameva
anya-e0105n:589_4: vattabbo assa. Yasmā pana tathā akatvā pubbe vuttappakāreneva kato, tasmā ayampi
anya-e0105n:589_5: visuddhimaggo tāsaṃ āgamaṭṭhakathānaṃ karaṇākāreneva katoti ca, tatoyeva mahāṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0105n:590_0: Ekacce pana vicakkhaṇā ācariyabuddhaghosassa ganthesu uttarapakkhasāsanikānaṃ assaghosanāgajjunavasubandhuādīnaṃ
anya-e0105n:590_1: bhikkhūnaṃ viya porāṇaganthe anissāya attano ñāṇeneva takketvā dassitaṃ dhammakathāvisesaṃ
anya-e0105n:590_2: adisvā asantuṭṭhacittā evaṃ vadanti “buddhaghosassa aññaṃ anissāya attano ñāṇappabhāveneva
anya-e0105n:590_3: abhinavaganthuppādanaṃ na passāmā”ti. Taṃ tesaṃ garahāvacanampi samānaṃ theravādīnaṃ
anya-e0105n:590_4: pasaṃsāvacanameva sampajjati. Theravādino hi evaṃ jānanti “buddheneva bhagavatā sammāsambuddhena
anya-e0105n:590_5: desetabbo ceva dhammo paññāpetabbo ca vinayo anavasesena desito ceva paññatto ca,
anya-e0105n:590_6: soyeva dhammavinayo saddhāsampannehi bhikkhūhi ceva gahaṭṭhehi ca yathārahaṃ paṭipajjitabbo,
anya-e0105n:590_7: na tato añño dhammavinayo takketvā gavesetabbo. Yadi pana añño dhammavinayo kenaci
anya-e0105n:590_8: takketvā kathito assa, taṃ tasseva takkino sāsanaṃ hoti na satthu sāsanaṃ. Yaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0105n:590_9: pana bhagavato dhammavinaye padabyañjanaṃ atthato apākaṭaṃ hoti, tattha tattha porāṇakehi
anya-e0105n:590_11: saṃvaṇṇitanayena attho gahetabbo, na attanomativasenā”ti. Ācariyabuddhaghoso ca tesaṃ
anya-e0105n:590_12: theravādīnaṃ aññataro, sopi tatheva jānāti. Vuttañcetaṃ ācariyena –
anya-e0105n:603_0: Teneva ācariyo bhagavato dhammavinayaṃ vā porāṇaṭṭhakathaṃ vā anissāya attano ñāṇena
anya-e0105n:603_1: takketvā vā attanā paricitalokiyaganthehi gahetvā vā na kañci ganthaṃ akāsi. Yadi
anya-e0105n:603_2: pana tādisaṃ kareyya, taṃ theravādino mahāpadesasutte dī. ni. 2.188; a. ni. 4.180
anya-e0105n:603_3: vuttanayena “addhā idaṃ na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ, buddhaghosassa ca therassa
anya-e0105n:603_4: duggahita”nti chaḍḍeyyuṃyeva. Yato ca kho ayaṃ visuddhimaggo porāṇaṭṭhakathānaṃ bhāsāparivattanādivaseneva
anya-e0105n:603_5: ācariyena kato, tatoyeva theravādino taṃ mahāpadesasutte vuttanayena “addhā idaṃ
anya-e0105n:603_6: tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ, ācariyabuddhaghosassa ca therassa suggahita”nti sampaṭicchanti.
anya-e0105n:604_0: Sīladhutaṅgādīnaṃ vibhāgo ca paṭipattinayaparidīpanañca pākaṭameva. Tathāyaṃ visuddhimaggo
anya-e0105n:604_1: suviññeyyapadavākyehi ceva anākulapadavākyehi ca tantinayānurūpāya pāḷigatiyā suṭṭhu
anya-e0105n:604_2: saṅkhato, tatoyeva cassa atthopi suviññeyyo hoti. Tasmā taṃ olokentā viññuno visuddhajjhāsayā
anya-e0105n:604_3: khaṇe khaṇe atthapaṭisaṃvedino ceva dhammapaṭisaṃvedino ca hutvā anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedenti.
anya-e0105n:605_0: Anekāni cettha pasādāvahāni mahātissattheravatthuādīni visuddhi. 1.15 sīhaḷavatthūni
anya-e0105n:605_1: ca dhammasenāpatisāriputtattheravatthuādīni visuddhi. 1.19 jambudīpavatthūni ca dīpitāni.
anya-e0105n:605_2: Tāni passitvā anussarantānaṃ sappurisānaṃ balavapasādo ca uppajjati, “kadā nu kho
anya-e0105n:605_3: mayampi īdisā bhavissāmā”ti diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjitukāmatā ca uppajjati.
anya-e0105n:606_0: Evaṃ parisuddhapiṭakapāḷinissayatādīhi anekasatehi guṇehi ayaṃ visuddhimaggo sakalaloke
anya-e0105n:606_1: patthaṭo jātoti veditabbo. Yathā cāyaṃ visuddhimaggo, evaṃ aññāpi ācariyena katā
anya-e0105n:606_2: tipiṭakasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyo porāṇaṭṭhakathānaṃ bhāsāparivattanabhāvādīhi guṇehi sakalaloke patthaṭāyeva honti.
anya-e0105n:607: Ettāvatā ca pana kimatthaṃ katotiādīnampi pañhānamattho vitthārena vibhāvitova hotīti.
anya-e0105n:793: Yaṃ’kāsi, kaṃ nu’dha na rocayate budhaṃ so.
anya-e0105n:803: Disvā hi naggharatanaṃ nanu vajjaye na.
anya-e0105n:808: Yyogena mettha hi vinā paṭipatti kā’ññā.
anya-e0105n:868: Kiṃ yaṃ thiraṃ lahu vinassati duppasayhaṃ.
